14311323111232121.content:
"I'm not, you know doing anything this Summer." Lily led on, "Maybe I could... help?"

"Help?" I snorted, completely taken aback that this scrawny little twig could have anything to offer me in the field of getting fat "No offense but... come on, you're skin and bones. Seriously, you've gotta weigh like ninety pounds, tops."

"Hey, you're the one with the weird... thing. The weird fat thing." Lily huffed, "I don't know, it's just... you know, you're really... interesting. I just wanted to help is all."

"I'm interesting?" I smacked my lips as cheetoh dust caked in the corner of my mouth, "What am I, a science experiment?"

"I was just offering, jeez." Lily stole a few cheetoh's from the severely depleted bag, which I would later steal back probably about ten times over through snacks and morsels off of her plate, "I know all kinds of good restaurants in town that aren't too expensive, and I live like, five minutes away from here. Plus... you do kind of owe me for giving me a concussion."

"Almost giving you a concussion."

"Almost giving me a concussion." Lily smiled at me, dotted with orange cheese dust, "So I think I'm a pretty valuable asset to you right about now."

Believe it or not, I hadn't really thought about it all that much. I was so used to living in Buttercombe Academy that even being home was kind of like living somewhere completely new. I didn't really have any friends there, and I had just moved here. And as much as Aunt Rhonda was down for a sixty-dollar pizza binge, I wasn't exactly ready to come out and tell her that I was trying to get even fatter on purpose. And that she'd wind up paying for most of it. It might be good to have someone around who could at least help me budget what money I could get before I had to get a job...

"Alright, I'll... consider it." I put on my best prep-school airs

"I'm like, the only other person you know besides your aunt." Lily added flatly, "Whom I have still yet to meet, by the way."

"I have considered it. You may aid me in my quest of inflating mine self unto an much more arousingly large figure."

And then we traded cell phone numbers. Seriously, it was as easy as that to find a friend. Who knew? I'd been in South Carolina for about two days and I'd already eaten myself stupid on pizza, found a cheap mexican restaurant, and made a friend who would put up with me being a colossal fatass. And Mom said this arrangement with Aunt Rhonda would never work out!

DING DONG

"Oh, hey, that's probably the food." Lily's ears perked up, "Do you want me to... of course you do. Right. Trying to get fat."

I knew right then and there that this weird little arrangement I struck up with Lily was going to be the start of something wonderful.
14311323111232121.title: Recruiting Lily to my Consumption Cause

choices: A clothing store that catered to people of my stupendously sexy size and beyond!
This new bakery in town offering a Grand Opening discount!
A gym. Oh no, Aunt Rhonda wanted to whip me into shape!
143113231112321213.content:
Okay, so my first few days living with my aunt were more or less uneventful. I ate, I slept, I ate more, I hung out with Lily a couple of times which inevidably led to me eating, Aunt Rhonda never even thought about learning to cook so we got takeout every night, et cetera. Don't get me wrong, it was a lot more fun than anything I would have been doing at home. But I was binge-watching Netflix almost as fast as I was binge eating, and a girl can only spend so many hours inside before she starts to get bored.

Which was why I was happy that, on Aunt Rhonda's first day off since I got home, we had a little outing together. I mean, don't get me wrong, I wasn't exactly thrilled to be walking anywhere, but still. The thought was nice.

"Come on Mel, at least try to keep up." my aunt called ahead of me, "It'll closed before we get there at this rate!"

Whenever my aunt wasn't wearing pantsuits and rocking skirt-blazer-and-blouse combos, she liked to dress down. Which was weird for me, because my Mom liked to dress like a school-marm everywhere she went. Aunt Rhonda had put on a pair of form-fitting jeans, a half-sleeved tight little t-shirt, and a pair of nearly-new Chucks; but she still managed to look runway-ready.

I would have been jealous if I wasn't so exhausted.

"Gimme a... break!" I whined as I bounced down the sidewalk, "You're the one who wouldn't let me stop at that hotdog stand..."

"Because I let you stop at the pretzel stand. And the corndog stand!" Aunt Rhonda stopped and folded her arms across her chest, waiting patiently for my fat ass to catch up, "Seriously Mel, I'm not made of money. I mean, big apartment, nice clothes, and picking up the tab for dinner aside, if I stopped every time you got hungry I'd be broke."

Since I'd moved in with my aunt, I'd pretty much been stuffing my fat face non-stop. Which was great in a lot of different ways, but not for my wardrobe. I'd only put on another five pounds since my arrival, but that was just enough to bust all the buttons off of my jeans. And rip my stretchpants. But, thanks to the good people who invented spandex, my short-shorts were still very wearable. They were big and bright and yellow, and I'd somehow managed to pour myself into them. Granted, they weren't big enough for me to tuck my stomach into. My belly was left unshielded to the elements, clearing my path for me as it quivered and quaked with my every awkward step. Behind me, my ass constantly threatened to swallow up the ugly yellow seat of the things, and I had to reach behind me every so often to pick the spandex out of my crack. I'd found an old blue tank top and managed to drape it over myself, but that wasn't much better. It was tight, so tight that it kept riding up on my belly. You could see every inch of me through my clothes, every dimple and fold. I'd attracted a lot of attention this morning. A girl my size barely dressed, walking around letting her big belly flop around and eating up a storm at every food vendor we passed? How could I not?

I mean it wasn't that Aunt Rhonda wasn't pretty or anything...

It was just that there was so much more of me to stare at than her.

"Jesus, I'm coming..." I puffed, "What's got you so... riled up... anyway?"

"Well, I was thinking that... you know, since you got here we haven't really spent any time together. No Auntie-Niece time, you know?" my aunt slowed her pace to match with my glacial waddling, "I mean, it's good that you're hanging out with your friend Lily, but I wanted to be the one to show you around!"

"She said thanks again for fronting the bill at Pizza Pie, by the way." I interjected, whipping out my phone to show her the text.

"So anyway, there's this little shop opening up a little further out, and I thought it'd be a great place for you and me to spend some time together!"

Little did I know, we were headed to...
143113231112321213.title: Rolling Around Town with Aunt Rhonda

choices: This place was practically made for me! Cheap prices, big booths, I'm in love~
This place was NOT fat girl friendly, but Aunt Rhonda seemed to like it a lot!
One of the waitresses looked really familiar...
1431132311123212132.content:
Aunt Rhonda and I eventually made it to our destination; a sweet little bakery that had just opened up the other day. It was a smaller building, dwarfed by the towers and skyscrapers in the rest of downtown, but it looked inviting nonetheless. Freshly painted, grand-opening sign out front, and large bay windows facing the street so I could get a great view of all the customers that weren't inside.

Seriously, where they even open?

I was about to find out as I barged in, belly-first and shiny with sweat. The summers in South Carolina were this awful mix of heat and humidity, something that my three hundred or so extra pounds of insulation didn't agree with. By then, my tank top was absolutely drenched in sweat. My belly had completely wriggled its way out of my shorts, and I had a wedgie straight out of rebel-flag-waving, southern-accent-talking, ocean-humidity hell.

My Aunt Rhonda had just barely gotten in the door when this woman, about her age and a good forty pounds heavier, greeted us. She was blonde, had on lots of makeup, and was wearing this bright red t-shirt with APPLE DUMPLING'S written across her impressive, southern-fried chest.

"Hey there, happy y'all could make it out today!" she said with an accent as thick as her waistline, "Were y'all lookin' to dine in?"

"Yes, please." Aunt Rhonda said pleasantly as struggled to breathe beside her, "And, um... do you think we could get a booth?"

"Sure, follow me."
1431132311123212132.title: Entering Apple Dumpling's

choices: As it turned out, my aunt had something of a serious sweet tooth...
Aunt Rhonda doesn't get the dozen, but she orders me enough to keep me comatose!
Savannah comes back with some good new for us...?
14311323111232121322.content:
The red-clad waitress lead us to a little corner pocket in the restaurant with a great view of downtown. At least, my aunt told me it was. I wasn't very focused on looking out on the street at the moment, considering I was pretty sure that I was dying from heat stroke. What's worse, the booth that our waitress had chosen was just a bit too snug for my impeccable girth. So my belly was already brushing against the edge of the table, which I'd learned could get very uncomfortable very fast after even just a little feasting, and there was pretty much nothing I could do about it. The booths were made into the wall, and the table was bolted to the floor.

"So welcome to Apple Dumplin's, mah name's Savannah." the waitress gave us two menus, "In case y'all were wondering, yes we are still doin' the Grand Opening discount; just, y'know, to get people talkin'." she whispered the last part playfully behind her manicured hand.

"Every order of a cake or dozen donuts of any kind is 30% off, a pan of anything like brownies or rice krispy squares is 20%, and the single items are buy one, get one half off." she continued, pointing out examples on a flyer she left on our table, "And, just so you ladies know, every order over $20 comes with a free Apple Dumplin's t-shirt."

"Sounds great!" Aunt Rhonda said excitedly, "My niece and I are going to need just a little more time though, is that alright?"

"Sure, sure. Take yer time." Savannah gave us a once over with a big smile, "Just holler if you're ready."

Our waitress made her way back behind the counter, into the kitchen, leaving my aunt and I to our own devices. I honestly wasn't sure what to make of this place yet. Yeah the servers were friendly, and there were some pretty good discounts on some already cheap prices, but it was hella out of the way and these booths were not fat girl friendly. Plus, if Savannah was any indication, I'd need a translator every time I came in here.

"Isn't this place just great?" Aunt Rhonda smiled eagerly as she looked up at me from the menu, "I mean, can't you just feel the whole 'down home, southern cooking' vibe?"

"Uh... yes?"

"Right? It's just so... southern. I love it!" she looked back at the menu, "And look at these prices! Why do they even need discounts?"

"I don't know..." I had learned long ago not to judge a bakery by it's décor. I mean, "charming" southern accents and cute little polka-dots on the walls aside, I hadn't even tasted their food yet. "It's... cute."

My aunt seemed really amazed by this place, but I couldn't exactly tell why. I think it was the fact that she was something of a hipster, and this place had just opened. She was probably just looking to get in on the ground floor so she could brag to all her lawyer friends that she had been here before they were, and then recommend it so she could say something like "I tell all my friends to go there." That's what she did with Gerardo's and they... kinda sucked. But even still, she seemed excited. And I was about to get treated to a sweets binge, so who was I to complain?

"You know, I haven't had a bear claw in years..." Aunt Rhonda glanced longingly at the menu, "Should I order one?"

"Buy one, get one half-off." I pointed at the flyer Savannah had left us, "Or hey, you could order a dozen for 30% off."

"You don't think that'd be too... much?" my aunt crinkled her nose at the thought, "I mean, for me."

"What? No, it's just a couple bear claws." I pshaw'd, dismissing the notion of 'too much' with a wave of my hand, "You said it yourself, you haven't had one in years. Just order a dozen, get the discount, and take the rest home with you."

"I don't know..."
14311323111232121322.title: Aunt Rhonda the Apple Dumplin'

choices: I tried to keep pushing against the table and... I kinda broke it.
We got our stuff to go and headed back to the apartment for a night in.
Savannah, seeing my plight, escorted us to a handicap booth...
143113231112321213221.content:
Okay, so I'd be lying if I said that the food here wasn't good. As much as I already kinda didn't like this place, they sure knew their stuff. I ordered a baker's dozen of strawberry cupcakes to start, where each one was about the size of a hand fruit, and two peanut butter cookies as a little appetizer to my appetizer. Aunt Rhonda actually surprised me by ordering her skinny self the dozen bear claws, which she proceeded to scarf down with an admirable eagerness almost immediately after our lose-a-star-on-Yelp level wait time.

"Mm... oh my god these are good." my aunt gushed, creme cheese dotting the corners of her mouth, "So much better than the bakery on Main street."

"Does the bakery on Main Street have wider booths?" I snarked under my breath, pushing against the edge of the table with my wide wobbly arms, "Seriously, I'm friggin' squeezed in here..."

The already mentioned tightness of the booths at Apple Dumpling's were becoming something of an issue, not even half way into my meal. I had managed to take out five out of thirteen cupcakes, as well as both of my cookies, battling the growing sense of unease that cut deeply into my stomach. The more I ate, the more my stomach pooched out. Which was a concern considering I didn't really have enough breathing room in the first place. It wasn't anything serious, just... a real, extreme discomfort.

"Mm... oh come on, don't be a sourpuss." Aunt Rhonda smacked her lips, "Don't tell me you, of all people, are going to let a little thing like that come between you and cupcakes."

"Hey, I'm just saying they should really let you..." my face twisted as I continued to push against the table in vain, "...adjust the seats or something."

"Oh wow... you are in there pretty tight." Aunt Rhonda finally noticed, taking a glance at the two inches or so of my belly oozing over onto the table, "Do you want to maybe get all this to go?"
143113231112321213221.title: Stuffing Down Sweets

choices: I had put on a lot of weight. With Lily helping me, how could I not?
I was beginning to see that my eating habits were... infectious.
I was told that I had to get a job. Free ride's over, I guess...
1431132311123212132212.content:
So, long story short, we got our food to go. My aunt told Savannah about the problem, she gave me this horrified look that practically screamed 'oh god, she's honestly too fat to fit into our booth!', but was super nice about it. Aunt Rhonda got her free Apple Dumpling's t-shirt, our orders topped off for our trouble, and they even threw in an extra t-shirt for me... even if it came nowhere close to fitting. I managed to wriggle my way out of the booth and we hailed a cab.

At first my aunt was kind of disappointed. She had this nice day planned out where we were going to actually go out and do stuff together, which I sort of ruined. I mean, I complained on the walk up, I wasn't exactly receptive to the bakery, and then I got my fat ass stuck in the booth. But after sneaking a few snacks in the back of the cab, a few jokes at my expense, and letting her list off some other places around town where we could visit that were more my scene, she seemed to cheer up enough to be receptive to my idea Auntie-Niece time...

"So does my sister know that you're still mooching off their Netflix account?" my Aunt Rhonda asked wryly from the other end of her corner couch, "Or should I bring that up when she inevitably calls me?"

"Please, the fact that there'd be a wasted account slot on her bill would be more torture than knowing I was having fun for once." I snorted, reaching past my huge stomach for another slice of pizza, "Uff... trust me, she doesn't care."

At some point during our day, I'd changed out of my big assed highlighter shorts and into something a little more comfortable. I had this pair of boyshorts that still fit me, so I just kept it and the tank-top on, freeing my lower gut from its slight but unbearably tight spandex prison. I took up more than my fair share of the couch, one arm engulfing the armrest while the other drooped lazily over the great slope of my gut. We'd ordered pizza too, after I'd finished off the dozen cupcakes or so from the bakery. At first it was going to be "for later" but then I just sort of started eating it. All I got was this look of "I can't believe you're still hungry" from my aunt before it was dropped.

My aunt sat on the other end of her giant, L-shaped couch, laying out length-wise with a pillow under her head. On the coffee table, there was an empty personal-sized pizza box that laid in her wake and more than a few napkins. She'd gotten in on the whole lazy day aspect of our day pretty quick, taking the rare opportunity to lay around in jammies in the middle of the day. She'd changed into her new Apple Dumpling's shirt and a pair of breathy, flowy black pajama pants.

Let me just say, this was completely new to me at the time. For a lot of my life, I had always just thought of my Aunt Rhonda as a much younger, cooler version of my mom. But still, a version of my mom. The fact that I was laying around with her, eating pizza and sweet stuff, watching Netflix in my PJ's was astounding to me at the time. She was always my cool aunt who bought me these awesome presents and stuff, but the fact that I could be so "myself" with her and not have to put on airs like my mom always made us do, or behave myself like when we were at Grandma and Grandpa's was just so... surreal.

It was nice.

"Ugh, omigod, can't watch..." Aunt Rhonda squinted her eyes and turned away from the screen, covering her head with the other pillow on her side, "Gonna go get another bear claw... tell me when it's over!"

My aunt suddenly sprang to life, rolling off of the couch with the pillow over her head and running into the kitchen, presumably to where she'd left her mostly-gone box of bear claws.

"Oh come on, you baby!" I hollered, watching the gory horror movie scene and scarfing down pizza like there was no problem. My aunt was a serious wuss if she couldn't handle Zombeavers. "It's not that bad!"

"Oh my god, yes it is!" my aunt squealed, the distinctive sound of fried dough slurring her speech, "She's turning into some...zombie...beaver... thing!"

I gave the all clear sign that all the nasty stuff was over with not long after, and I rolled my eyes as my aunt tiptoed back into the room. On her way, she dropped the box of bear claws in the trash can, completely empty. She made her way back to her spot on the couch, one last claw in hand, and resumed where she'd left off before her most recent bear claw break.

"Well that was fast." I snickered, big belly jiggling with laughter, "I thought you were savoring them?"

"What? They're good!" my aunt blushed, "Seriously, I haven't had those in years, I'm just catching up on lost times... plus, I'm not the one eating pizza after a dozen cupcakes."

"And two cookies." I added cheekily

So, exercise and tight bakery booths aside, we actually had a pretty good time together. I know it sounds weird, but I really liked hanging out with my aunt. She was fun, even if she was a bit more active than I'd liked to have been. Seriously, between her and Lily, I was having the time of my life in South Carolina. Way better than if I was stuck back home with Mom barking at me to lose weight and not to corrupt my little sister.

If I had to say it, that day was probably the day I realized that living with my aunt might not be all that bad.

A few weeks later...
1431132311123212132212.title: Nearly-Naked Night In

choices: I eat and eat and eat and eat... I'm un-fucking-stoppable!
I ate so much that I popped right out of my shorts! Right there in the buffet!
I was causing something of a commotion... the manager kicked us out.
14311323111232121322121.content:
After a few weeks in my new life of mooching off of my rich Aunt Rhonda, I was already starting to see some results...

"Mm... more."

I was already an eating machine before Lily got a hold of me. But that girl really knew how to motivate me. I had gone from mindless, indulgent binges to strategically planned mindless, indulgent binges. We'd worked out a system where I pushed myself to my absolute limit at every meal for one day, take a day to rest and let my stomach stretch (which still involved eating, but not nearly as much as the day before) and then repeating the process. It took a while to get used to, but I was really seeing the effects. In just a month, I'd already put on another twenty pounds.

"You go, Mel." Lily slapped my fat back, which caused a rippling effect throughout my entire body, "You'll earn that third chin in no time if you keep this up."

It made me so hot to eat like this. To just give in and stuff myself with everything I could get my hands on. Just food food and more food, all for me. I had always had a thing for food, but Lily's training really took it into overdrive. I was posessed, no, consumed by my need to eat. My stomach was roaring in agony, begging me to stop, but I had reached a point of no return. I was long gone.

Which was why we tended to come to places like buffets. It was just easier.

"Moar..." I bellowed again, hunched over my nearly-gone breakfast, "Seriously, I'm so... friggin' hungry."

"I know, I know." Lily said dismissively, patting my back again (she effectively burped me, I let out this window-rattling belch), "Here, lemme get you another serving. You want more pancakes?"

"God yes..." my voice was thick and husky, "And sausage."

"Just sausage?" Lily cocked her brown little eyebrow, "Don't tell me you're slowing down. There's still lots of bacon..."

Oh god, bacon.

"And eggs."

So fluffy and cheesy...

"Do you at least want some biscuits?" Lily asked again, tapping on her clipboard with my daily caloric intake on it, "I mean, there's still lots of--"

I could help it. The more she listed, the more I stuffed myself. Food just got me so excited. So aroused.

"Just... more." I groaned, clutching my stomach, "I'm so fucking hungry!"

Lily shushed me, and eventually returned with what I'd bargained for. Plenty of everything...
14311323111232121322121.title: Lily Makes me Large

choices: The Aftermath
Dinner!
143113231112321213221211.content:
More. More and more and more! Eggs followed sausage followed bacon followed toast dripping with butter. Danishes followed chocolate-stuffed croissants followed biscuits washed down with thick white gravy. lots of breakfast burritos, mounds of homefries, piles of hash-browns, fresh-made waffles, and stack after towering stack of pancakes absolutely drowned in butter and maple syrup avalanched into my overburdened, overstuffed, and overglutted stomach. It wasn’t enough. I was truly mindless. I was swollen to stupid proportions, but I wanted to see how much food I could shovel into my gut in as short a time as possible. I was the perfect combination of horny and hungry. A hunger that knew no satiation, no limit, and seemed to just grow the more I vainly attempted to fill it with mountains and mountains of food.

Grunting piggishly I crammed handfuls of bacon into my mouth, followed by a good thick chug of milkshake. I was panting heavily now, and slumped back in my screaming chair, my hands desperately clutching the stupidly overglutted sides of my truly gargantuan belly. I drank in my ballooning mass with a fiendish glee, observing lovingly that I had to have gained more than 20 pounds. My belly was just incredible, a massive mountain of blubber, and jam-packed with equally massive mountains of delicious grub. My poor overburdened stomach churned and burbled sluggishly, obviously struggling with this massive overstuffing, but if I had any say, thhis would just be the beginning of today’s festivities. Giving its bubbling mass some happy pats, I turned back to eating, only to be met with a massive sandwich, full of pastrami, salami, sausages, and all the fattiest most succulunt meats. It was one of those mass-produced hero varieties that catering companies make by the yard. Looking at Lily confusedly, a great burbling belch erupted from the overglutted vat of my gut, setting all my fat a-wobble:

“*HicuuuUUURRRP What’s this? Lunch? Already?”

“Yeah, Mel, you’ve been at it for 3 hours already, they’re setting the lunch trays out. Figured I’d start you off with this. You’re not full, are you?” Lily cocked an eyebrow, as her pencil whirred purposefully over the clipboard, busily and methodically recording everything I’d have eaten so far. 3 hours? It felt like nothing at all! Of course, I knew I was obscenely stuffed, all I had to do was listen to my massive gut slosh beneath me. But UGHH, just the sound of the frantic scribbling, and what it meant fired up the twin engines of horny and hungry right away.

Greedily grinning, I gave my belly some purposeful pats: “HIC. Me? Full? Look at this gut! More please! HIC. Heck, Lil, ask management if they can...HIC...just wheel the whole sandwich over here.” I started salivating at the thought, but my stomach gave a superswollen burble.

Even Lily stopped for an moment: “You sure, Mel? It’s pretty huge. You sure you’ll be able to handle it?”

“My belly can handle anything...HIC” I snorted derisively. “Come ON Lily, I’m UUURRHHUNGRY DAMMIT!!” I roared and lunged at the piece of sandwich right there. She sighed, and wheeled to do my bidding. Groaning in pleasure, I crammed mouthful after mouthful of rich food down my throat. One bite, two bites, three. Chew Chew Chew. Swallow. Repeat. I was so single-mindedly focused on eating that I took anything that was in front of me. I didn’t bother looking at Lily when she wheeled the whole sandwich up to me. I didn’t care when she carried a plate piled high with thick sliders. or platters of hot dogs. More more more!! I heard my stomach groan and bubble with vast strain, and I swore I could see my gut swelling and stretching right before my eyes, though I’m sure that was just the food-coma I was rapidly falling into. So much food, so much eating, so much fat; All I had to do was glut and glut again, filling, double filling, and triple overfilling my exploding stomach with as much food as I could possibly shove down my throat. Food flooded into my mammoth stomach at truly unprecedented rates, and my gut rapidly began expanding across the floor and churning in futile digestion that I ignored completely in my blissful feasting. More, MORE and MORE food avalanched into my overburdened body, and the more I ate, the more aroused I became.

I was consumed (hehe) with a desire to become MASSIVE, and I knew every crammed mouthful was one step closer to getting me there. I belched richly, and continued my paradise.
143113231112321213221211.title: I eat and eat and eat and eat... I'm un-fuc...

choices: Lily took me to meet her sister, who had just moved into her apartment...
Lily shows me this ad in the newspaper about a pie eating contest next week...
Lily showed me this little clip online that someone took of me gorging!
1431132311123212132212111.content:
I wasn't entirely sure how she did it, but Lily managed to get me home that night. Not only that, she managed to hail a cab on Saturday night, pay the man to get me across town, convince him to stop at a drive-thru for burgers, helped me into the elevator of my Aunt's apartment building, and steer my semi-conscious body through the front door. I mean, I wasn't exactly dead-weight at the time, but have you ever been around someone who's food drunk? It's very hard to make them do much of anything. Much less wait until they're home to take off their pants...

***


I wouldn't wake up until hours later, and I do mean hours later. My memory from the night before was fuzzy at best, I distinctly remembered it being before midnight before I eventually succumbed to my food coma, and it was one 'o' clock in the afternoon when I finally woke up. And I was still stuffed. My stomach was still all full and sloshy, but it had very much lost its firmness from last night. There was some room in there, but after nights like these I honestly didn't feel like eating right away. As crazy as I could get, I had my limits. And I just made some new ones last night. It would take a while for me to even be able to think about food again without puking...

I laid there for a minute before I decided that I needed to get up. I struggled to come to my feet, my knees knocking and my pathetic calves quivering in their attempt to support the massiveness of my self. The extra weight I had put on in the month I'd been squatting with Aunt Rhonda had done little to aid my mobility. And since my muscles felt like wet noodles right about now, my pace was even more slow and pronouncedly awkward than usual.

I came out of my bedroom barely dressed, my enormous stomach making a half-shirt out of a respectively stylish Hillary Heart tee, and wearing an old pair of boxers that I'd bought for comfort once upon a time, but now squeezed the crap out of my fat legs. I remember my stomach being really itchy, but being unable to really get the good part because of how big my belly was...

"Morning Mel!" I heard Lily's voice suddenly, and it freaked me the fuck out. I would have jumped right out of my skin if there hadn't been so much of me to weigh me down, "Sleep well?"

"Jesus Christ!" I yelped, stopping my stomach from wobbling as best as I could, "Don't--URRRAAAP... don't scare me like that, Lily!"

"Phew!" Lily fanned her hand in front of her face, "Oh wow, that... that was just awful."

"What are you even doing here, Lil?" I asked, coming down from my shock, "What happened last night?"

Lily had apparently borrowed a couple of clothes from Aunt Rhonda. They were hilariously too tall for her. Seriously, the legs on the black pajama pants she'd borrowed were clothespinned so she couldn't walk on them.

"You crashed, I told your Aunt you got super drunk, and she said I should stay the night to make sure you were okay in the morning." Lily said with a smile, her dark red hair still tussled into a messy bedhead, "You weren't kidding, your aunt is the coolest."

"I do my best." another voice came and startled me, this time the familiar surly purring of my Aunt Rhonda, and from behind.

"FU--uurRRRP!!" I jump-burped again, that last one actually managing to hurt a little, "Aunt Rhonda!"

My aunt didn't look exactly active either. Despite being dressed more size appropriately than my itty-bitty friend, she looked to have probably spent just as long in bed as I had. Her cute little bob was all messy, and she didn't have on any makeup. She was holding a bavarian creme donut like a handfruit, and taking casual bites out of it while I freaked.

"The coolesht aunt ever." she said through a mouth full of creme before swallowing, "Mm... like the sound of that."

"Oof... please, no donuts." my stomach gurgled in disgust, and I'm pretty sure that I turned green around the gills.

"Aw come on Mel, donuts are the best hangover food." my Aunt took another bite and paused, "Maybe not the creme filled kind."

Lily and I still hadn't told my aunt about my fetish. It wasn't that I didn't trust her, it was just... I didn't really feel like explaining everything, okay? Like how much I was eating, or why I was coming home almost every other night in a stupor or why I was going through clothes so quickly. She had been really nice to me, and hadn't said a word about me getting a job or paying rent, so I figured that I should at least try to not look like I was stuffing my face on her dime. I mean, it kind of looked like I was partying on her dime, which was probably worse in the long run...

My aunt sauntered over into the kitchen and made herself a cup of coffee, grabbing another donut after she popped the last of hers into her mouth.

"You and your friends are welcome to crash at my place any time." my aunt said with a smile at Lily's direction, "I especially like this one."

"Thanks, Aunt Rhonda." I burped weakly, "I'll try not to... uh, party too hard."

With that, she went back into her room, leaving Lily and I to our own devices...

"Oh my god, you told her I got drunk?" I whisper-moaned, "She's gonna think I'm drinking my life away! Seriously, couldn't you come up with a better lie?!"

"Hm... came home stupid, hungry, gassy, took off your pants... sounds drunk to me." Lily gave this sassy little face, "Seriously, why can't we just tell her what you're doing? I'm cool with it. She'll probably be cool with it too. I mean, she's cool with you drinking, right?"

"That's way different!" I rasped, plopping down on the couch, "It's... it's complicated, okay? Just... at least try to make me sound like a halfway decent person!"

"Sure, I'll tell her you took too much communion at church." Lily rolled her eyes, steal a donut from the nearly empty box, "For real though, I've got some good news."

"It better not be that there's donuts in that box." I burped into my hand, "I'm still nauseous from yesterday..."

"Better." Lily said, this diabolical little grin on her face...

14311323111232121322121111.content:
So the best way to explain why Lily and I saw each other so much, beyond her being my weight gain coach, was that we lived pretty close to one another. My Aunt Rhonda lived in a ritzy apartment building, and Lily lived in a not-so-ritzy apartment building just a little bit down the road. Of course, it was always her who came to visit me; as me burning that many calories on a brisk waddle that long would severely violate the terms of our contract and make Lily an awful weight gain coach.

But be that as it may I found myself lumbering stupidly down the road towards Lily's apartment for the first time in forever, on a full stomach no less, as Lily led me by the nose. I was miserable for every quaking step, my rounded stomach slapping heavily against my thick meaty thighs. I broke a sweat just wriggling my way through my Aunt Rhonda's door, and every footfall after that was just overkill.

Lots and lots of overkill.

"Lil..." I puffed weakly, "Lily... please... wait up..."

"Oh come on, Mel, you can't be that out of shape!" the spritely little redhead bounced around the halfway point, her hands on her narrow hips

"I weigh... four hundred pounds... dammit!" I wheezed, coming to a pathetic stop right there in the middle of the sidewalk, arching my back and sticking out my belly as I stretched pitiably, "You've gotta... give me... a little more time!"

"It'd probably just be faster to roll you there, fatty." Lily poked my stomach as I stretched it out (again, I almost threw up on her) "Jeez you're puttin' on weight."

"Oh ha ha..." I smirked, rubbing the spot where she'd poked, "I wonder who could be the cause of that?"

"Probably some bomb-ass redhead."

Eventually, we made it to her apartment. And wow was it a dump. Seriously, no wonder she never turned down Aunt Rhonda paying for meals. Cheesy lawn furniture everywhere, laundry out on the lines, lots of people standing outside at eleven 'o' clock in the morning with no dayjob, and worst of all no. elevator.

I almost had a heart attack right there.

Which Lily seemed to notice.

"Jeez, calm down Mel. I live on the bottom floor." Lily rolled her eyes, "Seriously, I don't think Charlotte would have agreed to move in with me if I didn't."

Lily had told me an hour and a long long walk ago that her sister, Charlotte (the fat one, remember?) had moved in with her sometime last week. Which was totally cool, of course. I was always down for meeting someone new (I'd been in SC for, what, a month? And Lily was my only friend to show for it!), even if I had to walk to meet her. It didn't exactly beat laying around in my undies all day stuffing Oreo's in my mouth, but it was something to do.

"Yeah, about that." I puffed from behind her, "Why did you sister agree to move in with you?"

"Something about her funding falling out at the school she wanted to go to." Lily said dismissively as she fiddled with her keys, "So she was going to go to school in Columbia when I'm all, hey, move in with me because it'll be cheaper."

"But really...?" I led on, twirling my fat finger expectantly

"But really, I figured you could probably use her help. Seriously, twenty pounds in a month? You must be slacking off." Lily slapped my belly fat as it pressed deep against her back, "Charlotte knows all about this stuff. If you do as she says, we'll need a crane to get you out of you aunt's place..."

I paused, a familiar tingle tickling beneath my folds...

"Plus, you know, she's my sister and I might have missed her a little." Lily twisted the doorknob, "So play nice."

So Charlotte was... a lot bigger than Lily had led on.

To put it bluntly, she was fucking massive. Bigger than anyone I had ever met before, Buttercombe Academy alum or not. When we walked in, she was in the middle of waddling towards the kitchen, and barely dressed. She had this huge, fleshy stomach that was so big and heavy it slapped against her thighs. Her tits were enormous, bigger than the girl's own head by a long-shot, and her ass was so big and fat it may have even put mine to shame. Though she wasn't as short as Lily, I was confident that her size must have had something to do with her height... no one could eat that much, right?

"Hey Char." Lily said plainly (as if she weren't speaking to the biggest fucking person in the world right now) "What, you gettin' a snack?"

"Like you have to ask." she sounded like Lily, but her voice was sultrier where Lily's was squeaky.

She turned to face us, an arduous process that I was beginning to understand all too well as my weight continued to climb. She tottered in place, her whole body quivering with exertion as her movement echoed in the hardwood flooring. She had a generous double chin that rolled down to touch her upper chest, and these massive pillowy arms that rolled over the straps on her tank.

"Hey, who's your friend?" she looked at me, one rust-colored eyebrow cocked curiously

"Nice to meet you." I struggle to form any words other than 'holy' and 'shit', "I'm Mel."

1431132311123212132212111133.content:
Introductions were informal (“Hi, nice to meet you.” “Yeah, same.”) and then Charlotte asked if I wanted anything to eat. Maybe she was just being polite, maybe it was Southern hospitality, or maybe Charlotte recognized a fellow glutton, but whatever reason she became my third favorite person in South Carolina (after Aunt Rhonda and Lily). Seriously, if you ever want to get on my good side it's not hard: just hold out a box of Twinkies and I'm yours.

And no, the fact I had made myself sick the night before didn't stop me. My belly made room when I saw how much food there was in the apartment.

It was soon clear that Lily wasn't hurting for money, appearance of her apartment building notwithstanding. While she didn't have much pride in where she lived, she did invest a lot in being a good hostess. Her kitchen was stuffed with food, the pantries and fridge almost threatening to explode and pour out boxes and bags of edibles like cornucopias.

And it wasn't Charlotte who had bought them. I got that as soon as the bigger sister opened a cabinet and rooted around, saying half-jokingly and half-frustrated

“Jeez, Lily. What do you have that isn't loaded with sugar or salt?”

“There's some granola bars in there,” the skinny girl said defensively.

“Yeah, double-chocolate and peanut butter. I'm not even sure if there's any granola in this.”

“You always liked sweets, so I made sure you had variety.”

Charlotte chortled, finally pulling out the box of granola bars and a bag of ranch Doritos. I could hear her rolling her eyes, but I didn't know if she was just playing at being exasperated with Lily's shopping choices or if she was serious.

“Help yourself,” Lily told me after I had already taken Charlotte's place in front of the cabinet. I just reached up and grabbed whatever my fat arms could hold – bags of minidoughnuts, a bag of pepperoni Combos, a thing of lemon crème cookies, and a bag of coconut flavored marshmallows – and followed Charlotte to the living room.

The biggest girl had claimed the sofa for herself, practically filling the whole thing, so I went to a bowl chair that looked like it was made of metal, so it should be able to hold me, right? I settled in as slowly as I could and listened for any ominous creaking. Lily took an open chair and for the next twenty minutes carried most of the conversation, serving as an intermediary between us two binging fatties and telling us each about the other.

When Charlotte was finished with her food (I was taking my time, not wanting to push myself so soon after recovering from last night's ordeal) Lily sprang to her feet.

“Want some more? I've got some of those marshmallow rounds you love.”

Charlotte groaned playfully, then waved a hand to say 'Bring 'em on.'

“And you two could probably use some drinks. I'll be right back.”

As soon as Lily was out of the room Charlotte turned to me and, her voice growing somber, asked

“So how much of that,” she indicated my clothes-straining corpulence, “is because of my sister?”

My pride as a self-built fatty caused me to reply immediately

“Not a lot. Just twenty pounds or so. I was fat when I moved here.” And I slapped my belly for emphasis.

Charlotte raised an eyebrow.

“No wonder she made friends with you so fast.”

“She seems to enjoy being around fatties,” I said, staying as neutral as possible. I'd seen how much Lily had gotten into helping me stuff my fat face and pile on the pounds, but the possibility there was something more driving her on was a question I'd been trying to not read into.

Charlotte fought back a laugh, lowering her voice a bit.

“That's one way of putting it. Another is that she enjoys helping people get fatter.”

I didn't say anything. She clearly had more she wanted to say, and I wanted to hear it.

“People in our family aren't naturally fat. Look at Lily; both our parents and cousins and uncles and aunts look like her. But since she was young she's enjoyed working in the kitchen, cooking or baking, and when she had food made she was insistent that people eat it. I ended up getting most of it, since I was the big sister, but as time went on Lily became more serious about making food or, when she had allowance money, buying it and giving it to people.

“Our mom just says it's a maternal streak to her, wanting to make people happy by giving them food, but as she's gotten older I think it's not so innocent. I think she outright loves to see people eat, she craves it. And she loves the results.

“Look at me,” she sat back a bit to emphasize how wide and fat her body was. “You don't get to 650 pounds by accident. For me, it came from living with Lily until she was an adult.

“I was reluctant as hell to go back to living with her, but the cost of keeping myself clothed and fed, not being able to walk everywhere so I have to drive, it piled up. I didn't have much choice, but Lily swore she wasn't going to force food on me. She didn't say why, but seeing you now I get it. She has a new project.

“Has she been offering you food a lot? Bringing snacks when you get together, or suggesting you get dessert?”

From the kitchen we could hear the sound of a blender. Charlotte looked over in that direction.

“Making milkshakes. Of course.”

She turned back to me, and I decided to be open. I wasn't sure Charlotte would get it, but I didn't feel she would be disgusted or judgmental.

“She doesn't have to offer me food. I love to eat, and honestly, I love being fat. She's actually helping me get fatter.”

Charlotte took a moment to process that.

So from that day on, until the contest, the every other day method to my madness for massiveness took an immediate back-seat to the more traditional, more painful method of stuffing my fat face for any and all hours of the day that I could manage without puking my guts up or exploding. Mainly, that I could even contain all the food that Lily was pumping me full of.

It was on one of my "on" days that Lily and I headed out on the town, looking for a new location for me to stuff myself at. I had just gotten kicked out of the little buffet that I'd been eating at pretty regularly for the past month now after my little all-day binge the other night, and wasn't allowed to come back. Which made all this the more exciting. I had never eaten so much that I'd been kicked out of a restaurant before, and Lily had been teasing me all day with promises of new buffets in town.

"Lily..." I moaned, big belly wobbling uncontrollably in front of me as I struggled to keep up with my itty-bitty trainer, "Wait up for Christ's sake..."

I was enormous. The biggest I had ever been in my life until that point. I was nearing four hundred and thirty pounds, and Lily had more than lived up to her promise of helping me gain weight. I couldn't fit into any of my clothes. I was wearing an old tank-top and some sweatpants that may as well have been cotton leggings. As I lumbered down the street, Lily make sure to stay extra-far ahead of me so I didn't run her over with my fat.

"Come on Mel, just a little further!" she called out to me, urging my fat ass forward.

A little further. Further to food...

I was so hungry. I hadn't eaten anything all day. My sleep schedule had taken this really wonky route where I'd stay up until the wee hours of the morning binging and sleep until noon, only to wake up groggy and sloshy. At first, it was really difficult to put myself on such a strenuous schedule, but Lily managed to guide me through it. Seriously, she knew a lot about making me into a colossal fatass.

Seriously, I've been looking around, and this is the place to get your grub on. Huge portions, big booths, friendly atmosphere, no small children allowed, it's great.."

It was kind of like a dive bar. Dim lighting, lots of neon signs, big TVs around the bar. It had a real friendly attitude about the whole place. Which was cool, considering that I planned on feasting in a judgement-free zone today. Just a little.

I did. I ripped it right out of her hands and practically pressed my nose against it. It had pictures of everything I'd be stuffing myself with today. More meat that I knew what to do with, so many starches I could grow a potato farm with them, more cheese than could possibly be contained by one cow! Oh God I was hornyhungry! I couldn't wait another minute!

"Well, can't you... like... order an appetizer or something?" I whined, "Seriously, I'm starving over here!"

"Big is such an understatement, wide load!" Lindsey continued to push my buttons, she palmed a roll of my fat and shook it, causing me to seize and shiver, "This is the biggest jelly roll I've ever seen!"

I don't know if it was the fact that I was already charged up from what I was ordering, the fact that I'd been so strung out from eating so much lately, or the fact that I was just a natural attention hog. But this girl was making me hot. All her insults and how amazed she was by how fucking huge I was, it made me squirm in my seat. I clenched my fat thighs together as my crotch got wetter and wetter at every passing remark. Lily must have been confused as to why I wasn't defending myself, but the truth was, I was too horny to!

Oh God, I couldn't even think about what was happening. My calorie-crusted little heart was beating so fast I could feel it in my ears, and my crotch was soaking fucking wet. So my meal was ready after another ten minutes, but we had to wait another thirty for Lindsey's to cook. And oh my God, this meal. This 'Murica Meal? Oh my God.

The first course was a burger about the size of my right tit, stacked high with five patties and loaded with cheese and bacon. Barbecue sauce dripped out of the edges, running off the bacon strips like dew on a morning leaf. Then there were the hot-dogs. Two foot-longers drowned in chili, mustard and onions, with more fries than I should have known what to do with. The third course was fried chicken, and it was probably enough for the whole chicken. You get it now, right?

I'd never been so ready to stuff my fat face in my entire life. I didn't even care that I was going to show out in front of that skinny, scrawny, alpha-bitch preppy, and I didn't care that I was probably going to walk away several thousand calories and sixty dollars richer.

All I wanted to do was eat.

Grease ran down my chin, my face was a mess, and I’m sure I had more than a little crazed glint in my eye, but I didn’t care. Lindsey didn’t matter, Lily didn’t matter, nothing mattered but my greedy stomach. I ate faster and with more ebullience than I think I ever did at that point, and had utterly demolished the entire meal except dessert until I vaguely came back to my senses and looked across the table to how my competitor was faring.

Lindsey was not in a good place. It was obvious at a glance that she had entered this ‘contest,’ out of pride, not skill. I hesitate to even call it a contest. It was a massacre. She had barely finished choking down her burger, and was slumped back in her chair, shorts unbuttoned, sweating profusely, and tears of pain squeezing from the corner of her eyes. Her friend Becky just stared at me in open-mouthed shock. I chuckled to myself and decided to make the victory even more complete and humiliating “Mmmm what a meal!...URRRP…Hey twig, you gonna finish that? I’m still feelin’ puckish.” Lindsey lolled her head my way and joined Becky in staring at me. After a few seconds she dumbly nodded and pushed her platters my way. I thanked her with a belch and nearly deep-throated the first hot dog of my erstwhile competitor in my eagerness. I knew I had won not only this contest, but also the meal challenge, but the depths of my gluttony-crazed had concocted a new plan, and a new hall of fame all for myself. I would finish TWO Murrican meal things as fast as I could. My stomach began to complain with this avalanche of food, but as usual, I ignored its pleas. Grunting happily to myself, I bulldozed on.

Lily later told me that most of the other diners had stopped eating, their own meals long forgotten, and were watching with varying degrees of morbid interest how much I could glut into my incredible gut. Of course, I was also putting on a bit of a show, belching, hiccupping and moaning with pleasure, but hey I can’t help myself around fod. Oh boy did I eat, I outdid even MY expectations of my greed. Continuous glutting. Continuous massive bulging mouthfuls and heavy swallows. As more and more and more piles of downhome American delicacies slammed into my gut, it began to bloat and swell further and further, taking on an even more stupendously heavy appearance. My tank-top slowly began rolling up, and the seams on the side started to creak ominously, but I could barely hear this over the sluggish burbling and churning that began to emanate from the gigantic vat of bubbling gorge that was my gut.

Finally, FINALLY, at just over 90 minutes, I had finished the last crust of my second pie. I had done it. I had finished MY version of the challenge. Gasping for air like I just ran a marathon, I contentedly slumped back in my chair, hands draped helplessly across the explosive swell of her mammoth belly. I unabashedly hiccupped richly and dazedly looked up at Lily, Becky, the comatose Lindsey, and my server, who was coming to congratulate me on my accomplishment. Despite my impossible feat, and my viciously churning gut, I could only think of one thing to say, licking my lips greedily: “HIICCCC…More please!”

14311323111232121322121112113113.content:
We ate.

We ate and we ate and we ate. And I didn’t realize it at the time, because honestly how the hell could I have? But I was about to get beat. Hard. This Lindsey bitch, I don’t know where she came from, but she could eat.

Which was surprising, you know, because she looked like she just waltzed right out of a Hollister catalogue. I had no idea, Lily had no idea, and the people gathering slowly gathering around us had no idea that this skinny little blonde bitch could match me bite for bite at every course!

The burger? While I was busy choking down bacon and drowning in barbecue sauce, Lindsey was scarfing down the sides like there was nothing to it. The chili dogs? This girl practically deep-throated those things, the corners of her mouth covered in chili which she then promptly had time to lick off and still stay in the time limit. The fucking chicken? Gone! Just… just gone! I had no idea what was going on—I did what I could just to keep eating, I had to stop myself from looking over at every nonchalant little burp or grumble that she let out just to stay within the time.

And finally, it came. The final course, after the pulled pork barbecue, was a simple little slice of apple pie a la mode. Just a little, tiny, itty-bitty piece of pie with a little dollop of ice cream on top. Surely nothing I couldn’t handle, right?

“Hff…Lily…” I burbled, my voice thick and heavy, “I can’t… can’t…”

“Come on Mel, just a little more!” Lily urged me stoically, “It’s just a little slice of pie. You love pie.”

I was wheezing. My belly was so full I couldn’t think straight. It had rounded out so much that it was just this big bubble of swollen pink meat, my various rolls and folds smoothed out along the crest of my gut as the food took up more and more space. I was tired. I was sweating. I had never felt so full in my life. At least when Lily and I binged at buffets, I could take my time. But now that I was forced to speed-eat, I was beginning to feel the effects of all that food I was sucking down. And it didn’t feel very nice.

“On yer mark…” Becky said with a smile, “Get set…”

“Go.”

Lindsey just picked up the whole piece of pie, ice cream and all, and stuck it in her stupid skinny mouth.

And the crowd went wild.

“Ha!” she cried out, jabbing me in the doughy upper arm with one of her manicured talons, “Pay up chubs! Sixty bucks, in my purse, asap!”

I was munching down on pie, slowly and stupidly. I was just so tired. My jaw hurt. My belly hurt. And, most importantly, my pride hurt.

I was an eating machine! How could I have lost to this scrawny little…little…twig?!

I paid up, and Lindsey rose to see herself out. She had this huge, pregnant-looking gut. It was rock-hard and pink along the crest. It rode up underneath her halter top, and at some point she’d undone the button on her dukes to let that big round thing have some breathing room.

You know she didn’t even pose for her picture? Bitch just waddled out, letting out a big triumphant burp before she left.

Stupid skinny bitch…

***


“Hey, at least you finished within the time limit.” Lily consoled me, giving me a nice relaxing belly rub back at my Aunt’s place, “You could have been out another sixty bucks if you hadn’t remembered to eat the ice cream.”

I was miserable. I felt awful. I had this awful, pounding headache that resonated deep within my gut. Thankfully, Aunt Rhonda was going out with her friends from the office, so I had the apartment to myself.

“It’s not abou—URRRRRP—“ an enormous, hot burp escaped me and rattled the windows of the living room, “the money…”

“Yeah, I didn’t think so.” Lily said with a knowing little smile, “So, you gonna ask for a rematch?”

“Shit, are you kidding me?” I gasped…

“There’s no way I can beat her…” I burbled, “I’m dropping out of the contest.”

“What?” Lily’s jaw dropped, “What does that Lindsey chick have to do with the County Fair?”

“She ju—URRRRP—st DOES, okay?” I bellowed, straining my throat to burp so loudly, “It’s like… y’know, why even bother if I can’t beat some skinny little twig?”

“But Mel, the money—“

“Woulda been nice, yeah. But… it’s a pride thing, y’know?” I remained as stationary as possible, so as not to disturb the big ‘Murican Meal-sized stone in my stomach, “If I can’t beat her then… y’know, what’s the point?”

Ultimately it took some convincing, but Lily was eventually okay with my decision to drop out of the contest. After all, it was my thing. I was the one who wanted to join in the first place, even if Lily was the one who showed it to me, and I was the one going through training like hell to do it. Eating just wasn’t fun anymore—Lily and I had started treating my eating like it was a job. And the whole reason I wanted to win that money was so that I wouldn’t have to get a job. So when I realized that it had stopped being fun, we stopped. Our lives went back to normal soon enough, and we were just back to being friends. No longer “eater” and “coach”, we actually had a lot more fun. We still ate out all the time, and I was still fat as holy shit, but me eating wasn’t all we did… does that make sense?

Anyway, so life went on as normal. I loafed around my Aunt’s place while she went to work and went out partying, Lily eventually got back into school, and all was well in the world of Mel. I’ll admit that without the constant pressure to keep eating had tapered off my gaining. Whereas before I could put on twenty pounds in a few weeks, I was noticing that my weight gain had plateaued somewhat. Spending my nights binging on takeout and mooching off my aunt had certainly served to fatten me up further, but after living with my aunt for a few months, I had only worked my way up to 460 pounds; a good sixty pound gain from where I started, yeah, but not quite enough for my tastes.

I was out on the town enjoying my no-college fat girl lunch at the Big Burger when…

14311323111232121322121112113113112.content:
I blinked once. Then twice. Then three times in quick succession, my jaw falling slack. "Uh...what?"

"I said," Lindsey's rounder face got even more red, no doubt a mixture from how tired she was from making her way over in a hurry and from the clear embarrassment she felt. "I said I'm sorry, okay? I'm just...!" she looked like she was about to go on a tirade from the way she raised her pudgy pointer finger, followed by the way she opened and closed her mouth in quick succession like she was fishing for the right words to hurl at me.

I shifted my bulk ever so slightly in the booth, excavating my gut from being confined by the table as I turned to give her my full attention. Normally, I'd not even bother with a sideways glance and just continue eating my lunch, but I was curious, and really wanted to hear what she had to say. Last thing I was expecting from her was to suddenly deflate her angry tirade and then apologize. Her, Lindsey, the snooty skinny (well, formerly skinny, I corrected in my thoughts) bitch who had beaten me at eating, who had been nothing short of unpleasant to me about my size, who had wounded my pride, apologized. To say I was surprised would be putting it very mildly.

Lindsey closed her mouth again, this time keeping it shut as she trembled with emotion, I guess, her new flab jiggling along as that belly of hers wobbled in all its prominence. Then, I swear, she surprised me again.

Her face just...broke. As in she suddenly lost all composure, and just burst with emotion.

"I'm just so sorry, okay?! I get it now... I fucking get it now! I get what being fat is like," she bit her lip at the legendary eff word and looked like she was ready to cry. "I understand how people look and treat you! So just...!" she bowed her head low, which only made that extra chin swell out further. "Please don't make this any harder than it has to be..."

That made me snap out of the numbing shock and now I stared at her with a frown. "What's that supposed to mean?"

"Nothing!" she shot her hands up defensively. "It's just...aren't you mad at me? Aren't you going to rub it in my face and be all, 'HAH, how do you like it bitch!' to me?" her eyes took on a downcast look. "I mean, I totally deserve it, but, y'know, why aren't you?"

I simply stared at her. This had to be a joke by some cosmic deity or a dream. It just had to be. No way this was the same snooty hipster chick who just at the beginning of Summer had made it clear she saw me as an enemy, had practically molested me (and aroused me to no end, I'll admit), had stepped on my pride, and had bloated to two-hundred plus pounds in the span of a month. It simply couldn't be, and not just because she was suddenly fat. She had just degraded herself in that sentence, saying she deserved to be chewed over. Which she kinda does, but for her to say it, to openly kick herself, just...damn. She's really not the same anymore, is she?

"Well, I..." I started, but quickly lost my train of thought. I was still reeling from surprise. "No harm done, but--"

"No harm done?!" she shrieked in abject shock, and I immediately looked all around us sheepishly as other Big Burger patrons started to look our way. Granted, people were already staring from when Lindsey angrily waddled over to my booth, but upon hearing her incredulous shout, now I was worried the manager might come out and kick us out!

"Hey, pipe down!" I hissed through my teeth. "Folks are staring!"

To my ever-growing shock, she clamped her mouth shut as her hands flew to her mouth, looking like a kicked puppy. God, I can't really take this, she's so humble now, so...different!

"Sorry!" she whimpered, shrinking onto herself like I was about to curse bloody murder at her.

I released an exasperated sigh, bringing a hand to massage my temple. "It's fine," I gestured with my pillowy arm at the opposite side of the booth. "Why don't you take a seat?"

"Oh!" her eyes went wide. "Is it cool?"

God, I think I need a fucking beer...

"Yes, it's cool. Now sit down," I paused, and then quickly added, "please" to the end of that.

She did so, and I couldn't help but sigh again. "Anyway, yeah, no harm done, so don't beat yourself up over it," I said, grunting as I shifted back into the booth so I was facing her, my belly going back to its previous position of consuming a good bit of my side of the table.

"But... I was...so mean to you and your friend! Mostly you..." she said quietly. "I attacked your body, tried to make you feel shitty about yourself..."

I released a loud snort at that. "I wouldn't call what you did as 'attacking'. And believe me, harsher bitches have tried, and failed spectacularly."

"Wait, you mean your size doesn't bother you?!" she stared at me in shock. And awe. Something lit up in my belly at that last one, something that just made me puff out my chest proudly, which made my belly lurch further outwards on the table. I realized it was good ol' fatty pride.

"You're really figuring that out now?" I laughed, patting my belly proudly while thoroughly enjoying her awestruck expression. "What, did you think I'm just a girl who eats too much for her own good and forgets to exercise? I mean, the first part's true, I love food, but my size?" here I stopped patting my gut, instead opting to grip it with my two fluffy hands and jiggle it. "My girth? I just love feeling heavy. I'm one of those kind of girls."

Lindsey was silent, her fat face set on this expression that was a mixture of awe and curiosity. "So, you eat and grow because...you like it?"

I couldn't help but grin. "No, I don't like it, I love it! It practically defines me!" I didn't think I could swell with pride any further.

"Then why weren't you at the County Fair?" she asked innocently.

Eight simple words and just like that, my good mood soured. Bad enough she brought it up, but from how she worded it, that meant she took part in the Fair after all. Fate just seemed to have it out for me lately.

Lindsey shifted in her booth, eyes staring at me with remorse. "Did I...have to do with that? Is it because of me you didn't go?"

I couldn't believe it. Good Christ, why did she have to hit that sore spot? More importantly, why did she hit that sore spot when she's changed now? Ergo, I can't bring myself to be mad at her! I mean I still kind of am, but now...shit!

"Did I?" she pressed again.

I didn't say anything, in which I cursed myself for forgetting that silence is not always golden.

"Oh god," she moaned, bringing her hands to her head as she slumped forward. "I'm such a terrible person, I'm so sorr--"

"Okay, stop!" I snapped, making her flinch but I wasn't in the mood to care. "I get that you're sorry, but it isn't about that, okay? It's about...you wouldn't understand."

"I can try to..." she murmured.

I rolled my eyes at that. "Okay then, seeing as suddenly you seem to know what empathy is," I looked her dead in the eye. "Then listen, all my life ever since I fell in love with the feeling of my own blubber, I've wanted to just get more. Enough is never enough, I just want more. I pride myself on making a total pig outta myself, I take immense satisfaction in attracting both good and bad attention due to my weight, and I enjoy living to the image society puts on me thanks to my size."

I leaned forward, which made her lean backwards as she felt for the first time the depths of my determination and passion. That, and my belly spread even further on the table.

"A literal human garbage disposal unit," I clarified. "Such as one at a certain County Fair, for example."

She gasped. "You mean..."

"Yep," I replied with a bitter laugh as I leaned back, ignoring my booth's creaking. "Then along comes this alpha bitch, like an alpha straight out of the movies like Mean Girls n shit, who happens to be a blonde like me, haha!" I ignore the way she flinches. "But nothing major, right? She's just a skinny little thing, and yet somehow--somehow--she manages to out-eat the likes of me! Can you believe that?! So no sense in me trying anymore for the Fair when some twiggy little twat beat me hard. So if a one-twenty pound skinny could topple a four-hundred pound heifer, then what exactly is the point of going to an eat-out at the Fair, right? What is the point?!"

I was breathing heavily after that long-winded rant. She was just staring at me, her eyes misting over. I sigh as I chuckle bitterly. In the end, I don't feel any ill will towards her. Bitterness, maybe. Some sense of pride that she's showing signs of coming out as a fatty, probably but I wouldn't go that far. But something negative like anger? Hate? Not at all. If I had any, they all died out when she said she was sorry, and showed me how much she meant it by being so damn humble.

"In short, I coulda been a contender, am I right?" I smile lamely at my dorky phrase. "Sorry about that, by the way. I was venting out, I called you names, but I don't hate you or anything," I looked down at my stomach in contemplation. "I guess... I just couldn't believe I got beat, and by a skinny girl at that."

"Well, I'm not so skinny anymore," Lindsey chuckled quietly. "But listen, about all of that, down to what happened at the dive bar, I...I have a confession to make."

I raised an eyebrow. Just when I thought she couldn't surprise me anymore. "What's that?"

She was quiet for a moment, but then she gained courage, looked me in the eye, and let it out...

"Hey Mel, did you eat the donuts in the fridge?"

I'll admit, it was a good question. One that wasn't too far off from the vicinity of logic. Did I eat donuts? Yes. Did I eat out of the fridge, sometimes? Yes. Would I eat donuts, had they been in the fridge? Probably.

But I hadn't... Really, it wasn't me!

"No!" I told my Aunt Rhonda so, "I didn't even know there were donuts in the fridge!"

"Mel, don't lie to me!" my Aunt had this real 'Mom' tone that must have run in our family or something, but for some reason I didn't hate it as much when she did it, "I bought donuts to take with me to the office, they're not here, and you have been known to eat things without asking."

"That was only like, six times."

I was sitting in the couch, as per ushe, and couldn't have looked any less guilty if I wanted to. I had put on another thirty or so pounds in the past few weeks alone, putting me at dangerously close to the big four-five-zero. I officially didn't have a shirt big enough to cover my belly anymore, so I just sort of let it flop out on my lap in a half-dressed nakedness that only I seemed to truly enjoy. My arms were bigger, my ass was wider, even my face was chubbier than ever. I had my long blonde hair tied up in a pony, to keep it off my neck while I watched Netflix in a hoggish bliss as I choked down my Lucky Charms.

"Mel..." my Aunt Rhonda led

"I'm...I'm eatin freakin' Lucky Charms, right here!" I rose the bowl up, sloshing some onto the curvature of my big fat thigh, "What do you want me to say?"

"Well if you didn't take them..."

My Aunt Rhonda came into the room, practically popping out of her panties. She really needed to get a few sizes up, but she hadn't done much shopping since I'd got here. I could see the curve of her cute little pot-belly as it rubbed against her t-shirt, and her HOLY CRAP HER ASS WAS HUGE...

Jesus Tapdancing Christ, how did I not notice that... those CHEEKS! Holy shit!

"Who did?" she purred demandingly, putting her hands on her hips and pushing out her hip expectantly.

My immediate response was to say 'probably you' but that seemed in poor taste.

Ever since I moved in with my Aunt, I'd basically been eating non-stop. And she pretty much tended to hang out with me whenever she wasn't working, which meant she was surrounded by as much food as I was, almost as often as I was. I guess it was only expected that she start to... fill out a little? I felt kinda bad about the whole thing, considering I was the one who helped flip her eating switch to 'ON'.

"I don't know, Auntie, but it really wasn't me." I said innocently, trying not to stare at my Aunt Rhonda's badonkadonk as it oozed out of her panties, "Honest. I haven't been awake long enough to eat your donuts."

That seemed to appease her, since she immediately lightened up. Her arms fell back to her sides and her head rolled back in anguish.

"UUUGH. Fine. Point taken." she said with a moan, opening up a kitchen cabinet to grab a bagel, "Wonder what happened to them, then? I paid, like, fifteen bucks for the whole box..."

My Aunt took a bite of the bagel, wretched, and then proceeded to slather it in creme cheese.

"Mmph... anyway, guess I'll have to grab some more on the way to work." she said through a mouth full of high-calorie bread, "Be good, I'll be back tonight. What are you thinking for dinner, Pizza Pie?"

"Y-Yeah..." I watched my Aunts bubble butt as it wiggled away, instantly feeling enormously creepy, "Sure, that sounds... good."

What was it about hanging out with me that made my family members fat? Seriously, first poor Alice and now Aunt Rhonda? Seriously, I was like some kind of plague!

A big, sexy... jiggly plague.

143113231112321213221221.content:
And speaking of big, sexy, jiggly plagues... Lily hadn't quite been immune to my infectious increases. I mean, I hadn't really been paying attention with my Aunt, since, ya know, I lived with her and saw her so often. Only recently had her backside taken me by surprise. But, seeing as I didn't live with Lily, the increases on her figure, not to mention her appetite, were a bit more notable as they increased.

Look, Lily was little when I meant her. Both vertically and horizontally. When we initially bumped bellies (well, more like her upper torso was bumped by my lower belly) I was surprised I didn't launch her half a block down the sidewalk. Again, this girl was maybe 100 pounds, if I was being nice. But she was small. And she was still small, compared to me, especially after the past few weeks. But with my sudden realization that my Aunt Rhonda had turned into a bit of an Aunt Rounda (especially in the rear area), I had a bit of a realization when I finally huffed my way to Lily's front door.

Now again, this girl, compared to me? She was a twig. But, compared to the lithe little Lily that I vaguely recalled almost bouncing into a concussion at the start of my trip here? She was quite a bit larger. Nothing astronomical, but lets put it this way: When a girl my size gains thirty-ish pounds, it's hard to tell. Well, hard enough to tell. Apparently my shirts have no problem discriminating. When a tall lady like my aunt puts on twentish pounds? Well, it's more noticeable, especially if she's so blessed to gain it all in her ass (not saying I'm jealous, but I assume most women probably would rather have a bigger butt than a bigger belly).

However. When a girl, with a height deficiency, such as Lily, hangs out with a girl, such as myself, who stuffs themselves constantly, swears by greasy food and sugary snacks, all the time? Well, they're bound to pick up some habits. And when you're Lily's height, you tend to show weight... Well, a bit more than most. But, with the past few weeks composing of glutting myself on my Aunt's dollar, followed by me glutting myself in Lily's company, I hadn't really thought about it. But today was a bit of a scorcher, which meant absolute hell for myself- look, this fat doesn't exactly encourage cool body temperatures, despite how I dress.

But Lily had opted for a tanktop which, if I recalled correctly, she wore one of the first times we hung out. She had combo'd this particular item of clothing with a pair of shorts that, back when we met, probably left a little, but not much to the imagination. As of the current moment, after she answered the door, I had two thoughts: "That shirt doesn't fit right", and "I think when Lily turns around, I might see more of her ass than I probably want to." The first, was proven correctly immediately. The second was proven correct when Lily waved me in and turned around, revealing a quarter of each asscheck as she walked off to her couch.

Me, being the sensitive, caring individual I am, immediately blurted out "Hey, Lil, I think you've been snacking a bit too much like myself." Because of course I did.

Lily, for what it's worth, took this in stride. "Yeah, I guess I have." I heard a familiar whoosh of her leather couch being plopped into, followed by, "Now are you gonna come in here and pig out on this ice cream with me or not?" I, of course, being the polite guest that I was, ignored the question and bolted (okay, waddled slightly faster than usual) to the couch, spotting Lily with an arm extended with a remote and the other hand gripping a large spoonful of ice cream, which was rapidly approaching her mouth. I plopped down on the other side of the plastic gallon of ice cream, eliciting a much louder WHOMPFHHH type noise and lifting up Lily's side of the couch as I did so. Damn, I was hungry. And hot. And so, with the provided spoon, I began to dig into the gallon of ice cream, 3/4 empty, with my current best friend.

Sometime later- Okay, about 25 minutes later, I let out a moan as my head began to pulsate with the familiar pains of a brain freeze. "Finish without me..." I said dramatically, throwing an arm over my head in mock angst. "I just can't go on, sailor. Leave me to burn with Britain." Lily giggled.

"I'm pretty sure you just mixed up, like, 3 different wars, and 4 different war's worth of cliches, but whatever. It's mostly liquid by now." And with that, she titled the plastic tub up to her face and downed the rest. I stared at her little (again, relative, although I had to admit, it was getting there) tummy while she did so. Finally, I felt the pain begin to subside, and I had to ask:

"Do you seriously not get brain freezes?"

Lily stared at me for a second. "What's a brain freeze?" She cocked an eyebrow.

I stared blankly. "You serious?" She nodded. "An ice cream headache?" She stared blankly. "Your brain doesn't hurt when you eat too much cold stuff? Seriously, that's why I had to take a break." Again, she stared at me, clearly confused. "You've never drank a slushie too fast and felt like you had a headache for a minute?"

Lily let out a small laugh, before she realized I was serious. "No, never. Never ever."

I was beyond stunned. "Bull. Shit." But she clearly wasn't fucking around. "Look, we're gonna go to the gas station, and I'm gonna buy two slushies, and you're gonna chug one. You need to prove this to me." She looked a little startled, but agreed.

Fifteen minutes later, we were at the gas station. It would've been about two minutes, but I needed a snack, since I honestly didn't think Lily was going to shotgun the last of the ice cream, so I heated up a taquito- look, I needed something hot to counteract the cold ice cream right before I drank a 42 ounce slushie. I, of course, went the awesome route- cherry, then blueberry, then cola, then cherry, then lemonade, then cherry again. Lily, because she's kinda lame, just got 42 ounces of boring old cherry. We walked out to her (thankfully) air conditioned car, and I stared her down.

"Look, this is how you prove you're not shitting me. You have to chug that whole thing, right now. No stops- breathe through your nose. If you can do that, without stopping, I'll get us dinner later. If you lose, you have to buy. Got it?" She nodded, her face nothing but seriousness. "And... Go."

And I'll be damned. She did it. Either this girl had the pain tolerance of a Saint (seriously, I'm kinda bad at metaphors) or she couldn't get brain freezes. "Well, I suppose congratulations are in order..." I said as she let out a moderate belch. "We'll go wherever you want for dinner, my treat." Well, technically it'd be my Aunt's treat, since she kinda gave me money, but whatever. However, Lily looked a little worse for wear.

"Yeah, can we, uh, get dinner later? I'm not feeling too good from all the sugar." I, of course, agreed- I certainly could keep myself entertained with this slushie for at least twenty minutes, and then there were all sorts of snacks at Lily's place. However, by the time we got home, the fact of Lily's recent gain had crossed my mind again. And since I truly am the master of tact, as we chilled on the couch, me sitting upright (it's hard as hell to drink a slushie laying down) and Lily laying on her back, her feet of the couch, I finally had to ask.

I poked her protruding belly and said, "Hey, what's up with this? I thought I was the one getting fat."

Lily let out a small hiccup from the sudden force against her gut, and said-

"Hey, screw you!" Lily covered her belly with her arms defensively, "It's not my fault I gained a little weight hanging out with you!"
