1431132311123212132212211212221321232211.content:
Whaaaaat the fuck. I stared at my little sister who stood there, sniffling quietly.

"Are you- I mean, I thought you loved it at Buttercombe..." I said gently, trying to wrap my head around the situation. "You literally sat there and talked to me and Rhonda about it for, like, ever."

She nodded, but I could see how upset she was- apparently ripping her clothes hadn't quite entered her lexicon of things larger girls had to worry about. "Yeah, but... I mean, I don't- I don't feel good about my body anymore." I stared her down, hard.

"Alice." She looked up at me, her eyes shimmering with the promise of fresh tears. "What about your body doesn't 'feel good' to you?" She looked a little taken aback, and I had to pace myself a bit. I forgot that everyone on the planet doesn't, y'know, strive to be on the right-hand of the "weight" bell curve. "What I mean to say..." I began again, in a slightly softer tone. "Is that, you... You are a beautiful young girl- you're healthy, you're adorable, and a few pounds don't change that. At all." She looked at me, wide-eyed, like I had just told her that she was adopted. I decided to push forward. "I mean... You just don't have to be ashamed of your body! I mean, hell, look at me." To emphasize my point, I grabbed my prominent paunch and shook it, before grunting unhappily- that hurt a lot more when you carried the weight of two people in your front-center mass, not to mention just gotten done eating.

Alice looked at me with a half smile. "No, I... I get that. And you're not wrong- I mean, I'm not ashamed of my body- really, I'm not, and how could I be, after seeing some of the older girls at Buttercombe... And having you as a sister." I oogled at her, not sure if she was making a crack at me or just an observation, but she continued without prompting and I decided to let her go.

"I just... Buttercombe gave me such a good experience with fashion, and everything that goes into it..." I nodded- I knew all too much how much my sister loved the design aspect of clothes. "And... Well, look, they don't exactly have an advanced course there. In fact... One of my teachers actually told me that I should look at this other school."

Okay, so now I was starting to get the whole picture, or so I thought. I tried to keep my tone calm when I asked my next question, since it went against everything I held close to my own heart and values.

"So...You wanna slim down because... Of fashion?"

Alice looked appalled. "What?"

I awkwardly looked at the ground and realized I might have been blushing. "I mean... You just... You wanna design clothes and all, and there isn't a lot of options, y'know, my size..."

I felt two skinny (okay, not quite skinny, but definitely smaller than I was used to) arms wrap around my gut- well, as much as she could reach. "Don't be dumb, Mel- you're part of the reason I want to design clothes in the first place- seeing you wear sweatshirts and yoga pants all the time kind of wounds me, although I definitely understand why you do it, now..." She glanced back at the tear in her shirt.

"Okay, well then what's all this about slimming down?" I asked, now a little indignant.

"Oh, well..." Alice had now turned a bright shade of pink.

“Welllll… there’s sorta this guy I’ve been…” Alice’s smile stretched outwards oh-so-subtly, “y’know, talking to, and—“

“Woah woah woah. Woah.” I blinked stupidly shaking my head incredulously and causing my chins to wobble from side to side, “Like… like talking talking or like talking talking? A-And where did you even meet a boy at an all girl’s school? How have you been… where… what?!”

“Calm down, Mel. We’ve just been talking.” Alice giggled innocently before clarifying, “Talking talking. I met him in town with Sam one day and we sort’ve… kept in contact.”

“And he’s a boy, like with a penis?” I was so fucking flabbergasted—my little sister was way too young to start dating! “Because I haven’t even met him and so help me God I will sit on him if he tries to—“

“Mel, Mel please it’s not… it’s nothing that serious.” Alice gave another little giggle, clearly tickled by my reaction. This was probably the first time that I’d ever had to worry about that and Alice of all people. Clearly we were in uncharted waters here, and I was not faring well! “It’s just… y’know, I want to… look my best.”

Suddenly it all started to make sense. I knew that there was something different about Alice when she walked through the door, even taking the forty or so extra pounds she’d picked up into account. She was brighter, more talkative; hell, she managed to hang with my friends without an issue. Before she left for Buttercombe, Alice probably would have gotten an anxiety attack from the idea of going to a new place, but now she seemed so much more outgoing, so confident, so… normal.

I wanted to think that it was maybe because she was hanging around me, or that Buttercombe Academy had done what it had done for me and helped her come out of her shell.

I only realized it then, but it had. Just in a very different way.

“I… I gotcha, Squirt.” I said with a smile, wrapping my wide wobbling arms around my skinnier sister and pulling her close into my tit for a fleshy hug, “Just so long as he’s not… you know, making you lose weight or anything, right?”

“What? Zack would never—“

“Ah-ha! So his name’s Zack!” I shouted, “Now just gimme a last name, I’ll Facebook stalk this little twerp. Find out everything there is to know about him, just you wait!”

“Mel.” Alice laughed, hugging me tighter, “I love you.”

“Love you too.” I said with a squeeze, “But I gotta be honest with ya, Al… if you wanna ‘look your best’ or whatever for this Zack guy… you may want to cut back on the food court menu. And maybe… you know, don’t let Marie order for you.”

“Ugh, I know… I feel like a blimp.” Alice cupped her paunch with both hands and gave it a good shake, eliciting a petite burp from deep within her paunch, “But it’s so hard! I see all this yummy food and I just want to eat it…”

“D’awww.” I squished my sister’s chubby cheeks together, “First world problems.”

“I’m serious!” my sister whined, “I’m never gonna lose any weight if I can’t stop eating…”

“Don’t worry about that, kiddo. I might not be able to help you lose weight, but I can at least keep all that delicious, delicious temptation away from you.” I said with a proud slap of my stomach, “Catch my drift?”

“You’re the best.” Alice said with a smile

“Tell me something I don’t know.” I burped, “Now c’mon, hide that dress so you can not be tempted by some pizza. M’startin’ to get a little peckish…”

“Don’t tell your mom I told you, but… she used to be pretty fucking fat.”

Everything in that moment was literally just me trying not to choke on my ice cream.

“Seriously?!” I shouted all-too-loudly because holy shit my mom used to be fat, before quieting down as my Aunt Rhonda gave me the dirtiest look imaginable, “Shit, I mean… seriously?”

“Yeah, she used to be pretty big.” My Aunt said in a corrective tone as she went back to slurping down ice cream, “I mean, we both were—Dad owned a cake shop, for God’s sake. But she was always way bigger than I was.”

I was fucking gone. Just straight up flabbergasted. My mother, who up until very recently had spent most of my life making me feel like shit about my size, used to be (and I quote) “pretty fucking fat”? Ludicrous. Hysterical. I literally couldn’t believe it, but I so very much wanted to.

“No goddamn way.” I finally said as a smile that bunched up my chubby cheeks, “You’re fucking with me.”

“It’s true! Cross my heart.” My aunt said with a criss-cross motion over her flabby left tit, “Here, lemme… nph…”

With a herculean effort on her end, my Aunt Rhonda managed to heave her fat ass off the couch in only two rocking motions. Her ass sank behind her as she tottered over to the shelves on the wall, her sagging gut swaying slightly with her awkward waddling steps. She held her arm out, her pointer finger extended as she browsed various books and albums that sat on top of the stylish fixture until…

“Ah-ha!” she announced triumphantly, grabbing an old photo album off the shelf, “Your honor I present to you, Exhibit A.”

It was an old book of family photos—presumably one that included my grandparents and their kids. The pages were old and crinkly, but the photos inside were still more or less in pretty good shape. A little faded, but not so much that I couldn’t make them out. Some were in worse shape than others, but I didn’t seem to be missing out on anything too important.

“Here, lemme…” my Aunt picked the book out of my hands and pawed through a few pages before announcing “Here we go—here’s me and your Mom just before she moved out. Notice anything?”

She gave the book back to me, her pointer finger extended over the picture I was supposed to be looking at. There was Mother Carlyle—I recognized her from an old photo back home—and the guy with the weird mustache must have been my grandfather. There, next to my grandmother, was this hippy little blimp with black hair and glasses. Presumably that was my Aunt Rhonda, who may have underscored her own size in favor of highlighting my mother’s.

“And there, my dear niece, is one of the last remaining evidences of my sister’s “chubby phase”.” My aunt said with a smarmy grin, pointing to the other side of the photo…

1431132311123212132212211212221321232211.content:
Okay, let me just say, that this was beginning to become kind've a thing with me.

First I moved in with my Aunt, and then she got fat.

Then I met my best friend Lily, and then she got fat.

Now I had finally reconnected with my (up until then) very controlling, very manipulative, very fatophobic mother, and now she decided she was going to get fat.

You know, at first? I didn't believe it. I didn't honestly believe any of the shit that my Mom had said that night. I mean, I believed that she used to be about my size when she was younger (I kind've had to—doctoring photos was a lot harder back then than it is now) but I didn't honestly believe that she meant any of that shit about wanting to be fat again. I really, genuinely believed that she was going to yell 'psyche!' and a camera crew was going to come out of nowhere and I was gonna look like a big fat idiot.

But as the days rolled on and the pounds kept piling on, I was forced to change my opinion.

That night, the three of us went for Cook Out and cleaned the place out. Keeping up with me was one thing, and keeping up with my ravenous Aunt Rhonda was another, but keeping up with both of us, with the addition of my newly ambitious mother meant that we actually closed the place down while they restocked. I was skeptical, given the queasy looks that she gave her so-thick-you-need-a-spoon milkshake, but my suspicions were abated by her willingness to go through with what I believed was a larger part of her plan...

When she started talking to me more I was more concerned, but none more so than when she started asking me where I kept my clothes from my "skinny days" so she would have something to wear around the house. Not only had she and I not spoken on the phone until she came to visit me, but she would have never called my days as a chubby Sophomore in Buttercombe Academy anything resembling skinny. I thought it was another step in her scheme, something to get me on her side to make her betrayal all the more satisfying. But when I heard a very audible 'RRRRIIIIP!!' from her end of the phone, I allowed my eyes to unnarrow. That sounded way too real...

And when she friended Lily and Marie on Facebook, I got downright disgruntled. But when I saw all the links that they were posting and tagging each other in, I...

I...

I couldn't believe it. My Mom was really doing this.

She was gonna get fat!

And in that moment, I felt... strange. Like, good strange. It wasn't like I wanted my Mom to get fat or anything. That would have been weird. But, you know, we hadn't had anything in common for so long; since I was eight years old. The fact that we had something that we both shared was... nice!

And as time wore on and her profile pics got chubbier and chubbier, and her posts increasingly food oriented and size-positive, and her talks with me became more and more oriented on how I managed to keep myself clothed throughout my expansion, I thought... wow, this is really happening!

Even Alice, on home from her Summer break, was surprised at the swift and sudden change in our mother.

"I don't know what it is, Mel but Mom's... she's acting so weird!" Alice's voice poured into my ear from the speaker on my phone, "She's cooking so much now that she and Dad are, um... are split up. Y'know? I'm kinda worried!"

"Don't be, she's fine!" I roared boistrously, "Let her, uh... cope in her own way, Al."

"But Mel she's getting so...fat!" Alice lowered her voice, "And she's cooking so much lately, I don't think I can keep up!"

Rest assured, she would. But that was a story for another time.

The point was, my Mom had really turned over a new leaf. That one night with me and her sister had really made a difference in her life. Ever since then, she had just started... letting loose! And it was great!

Which was why...
1431132311123212132212211212221321232211.title: Turning Over a New Leaf

Okay, so me, Aunt Rhonda, and my friends were all excited to hear that Alice was coming over for a visit, and after my mom got that new outlook on life, and started to try and regain her former corpulent beauty back, I more than expected some changes in Alice's girlish figure. "To be fair…" My mother said, getting our attention. "We did a lot of snacking on the way." Mom said as she waddled inside the apartment, Alice in tow, "It's probably not easy for her to adjust to the new me…" She said as Alice plopped her new, double-wide butt on the couch and as if on instinct, she started channel surfing. Despite my shock at seeing my little sister having gotten so big, I couldn't help but feel a little emotionally happy as I waddled over to her, eager to hang out with her and catch up with her, seeing as we haven't seen each other in a very, very long time.

I asked her with a little laugh, “Gawd, I miss that place so much, although, I GUESS I could go for my teaching credentials and try and get a job teaching at Buttercombe." Me and Alice immediately began engaging in conversation, telling each other how we've been, and before we knew it, we had decided to go outside to hang out. Of course, I hadn't expected Alice to also have a massive appetite, something I found out about after we were already at Apple Dumpling's, and I was actually a little impressed, her appetite was getting close to matching my own, she was eager to stuff her face, and just like that, I decided that this was better, that Jan 2.0 was the best thing that ever happened to our whole family.

"So, um, M-Mel." She stuttered, swallowing the food in her mouth, "Buttercombe's been great, and, well, I miss you…" She said and I swore my heart was almost as big as my massive belly when she did.

"I miss you too, Squirt." I hugged her very tightly, eliciting a familiar gasping noise from deep within Alice as I squeezed the life out of her, "So, how are things with your friends?" I asked as Alice began to get a little nervous.

“Oh, right…” She said as she started twiddling her fingers. She turned so crimson that she looked like a tomato ready to pop—I guess she had something she really wanted to talk to me about, "Well, my friend Sam, she was wondering if she could come visit next time? After the semester lets out, of course!”

“Well I told her what…happened a while back.” Alice paused as she knowingly glossed over our mother having evicted me from the family home, "And she admitted that she wanted to meet you, so I talked to mom, and she told me that she'd ask Aunt Rhonda about it and…well…”

I couldn't believe it, ALice was getting pretty confident, having as much confidence as she had fat on her titanic tushie, normally, she'd have stuttered shakily throughout the whole sentence, but nowadays she said it without a single stutter and she didn't even get the slightest bit shaky as she spoke!

"Of course!" I said ecstatically, "I don't mind but we'll need to see what Aunt Rhonda says about it…" I said as I began to get excited, I'd been wanting to meet Alice's friends for a while now and now I was being given the opportunity to do so with one of them, I could barely contain it, I needed to see what Aunt Rhonda was going to say about so I whipped out my phone and texted her about it. Almost instantly, she had texted back that Sam COULD come over, and that got us both so happy that we immediately began ordering more food to stuff ourselves, getting some grub for the road, and began to make our way back to Aunt Rhonda's place to spend some time with our new and improved mother and so that Alice could contact Sam about the whole thing

"Yay!" I squealed, "This calls for a celebration—I’ll get the ice cream."

"We ate the ice cream." Mom managed through her mouthful of bear claw, "Like, an hour ago. Sorry, Mel…"

"Then we'll order out! Pizza? Apple Dumplin’s? take your pick ladies!”

“Mel, I really shouldn’t—“

But I wasn’t having any of that. I was FINALLY going to meet one of the friends Alice had made at Buttercombe and I felt the need to celebrate this moment in a massive family pig out. I couldn't wait to see this 'Sam' girl! Although, I figured that she must be pretty big since she was at Buttercombe. And I've heard so much about her, and now she was coming here! To meet me! Because Alice wanted to introduce her to me!

If that didn’t call for emergency-delivery-food, I don’t know what did.

The next day…

“Oh.” I blinked, my rage quickly dwindling, “Ohhhhh~”

“Yeah.” Lily harumphed, her head shrinking between her shoulders, “So… yeah.”

Suddenly it all made sense. Why she was so awkward around me at first, why Lily had gotten so mad, and why a skinny twig like that seemed to have an appetite on par with mine—she was a chubby chaser! She liked her ladies big and bodacious, and I just so happened to be the biggest and most bodacious person this side of the Mason-Dixon, let alone between me and Lily! No wonder Lily wanted me to keep my distance; she wanted to keep the competition away!

“I didn’t even know you liked girls!” I couldn’t help but squeal—believe it or not, I was a real sucker for this sort of stuff, “Aww, Lily!”

“Shush.” Lily put a pudgy finger on my lips, “Not another word.”

“But Lily this is huge!” I gushed, grabbing her by her doughy waist and pulling her into a belly embrace, “How do you even know she likes her ladies plump? How do you even know she likes ladies period?”

“Please, have you seen the looks she’s been giving you since she got here?” Lily added bitterly, pointing to Mary, still inside the restaurant and oblivious to what was going on with us, “She’s been here five minutes and I’m pretty sure she’s ready to propose to you!”

I… hadn’t noticed. Really, if it wasn’t edible, it didn’t really register to me—at least not immediately. If Mary had been giving me the goo-goo eyes, I had been too busy eating to really notice; let alone reciprocate. And when she started listing off all that food, that was just my tummy talking. I had no intention of making a move on Mary. Certainly not now that I knew my pint-sized porker of a friend was sweet on her.

“Look, I get it. I’m sorry.” I apologized and pulled her close, “I’ll leave you two alone… just warn a girl next time!”

“Okay, okay.” Lily laughed, her belly brushing against mine as she wobbled in my arms, unable to wrestle with my superior fat girl strength, “Just… head back to your Aunt’s house. I’ll text you later, okay?”

“You will text me through the whole thing.” I added, “And pay for subs, Chinese, and Pizza at a later date.”

“Deal.” Lily smiled, “Thanks Mel.”

And so, I went back inside, said my goodbyes (trying to come across as friendly but not too friendly) and caught a cab back to my Aunt Rhonda’s apartment…

DINGDONG

Forty-five minutes later, Aunt Rhonda returned from her short trip to the front door with four extra-large boxes that reeked of pepperoni, cheese, and good-old fashioned pizza grease. She had to hold her arms out wide, due to their size, and they cut pretty noticeably into the top of her belly as it rolled over her waistband. On top of them, a bag of cheesy breadsticks and two 2 liters of Coke had been delivered as promised.

As she bent over, I could practically hear the seams in her sweats groaning in pain as her massive ass threatened to pop right out of the overtaxed bottoms. My authentically-fatass aunt grabbed the topmost of the pizza boxes and opening it up to take an eager whiff.

“Hey Auntie.” I said in mock threat, my chins quivering as I spoke, “Don’t leave your favorite niece hanging over here.”

But apparently, it wasn’t “a lot” for Aunt Rhonda.

My Aunt had become, slowly but surely, one of those people who zoned out when she watched TV. She could just blank out, eyes glaze over, and munch mindlessly on the couch while her shows played—a recent side-effect of me introducing her to Netflix and Supernatural, so yeah that one’s kinda my bad. Now normally, when that happens, the worst thing that comes out of it is a missing bag of chips or something. Maybe a carton of ice cream for those regular-grade fatties.

That meant that every box of pizza within her reach was a victim, and her trusty box of bear claws was better than a security blanket. She ate incessantly, gripped in the wonderful world of the Winchester brothers and completely unphased by how much she was stuffing into her face. The more tenuous the situation, the faster she ate. The more drama-filled the episode? The faster she ate. Every twist and turn of the CW’s magnum opus was met with a furious bite and chomp from my Aunt Rhonda as she scarfed her way through season 8 with me, her cheeks bulging as she shoved bite after bite past her lips and down her throat with reckless abandon; grunting and mustering through the whole ride.

Even as her breathing grew labored, heavy and shallow due to the due-term food baby she was nursing, she found herself unable to stop. Not that, y’know, I tried to. But still. I mean, I’m pretty sure she would have kept eating if I tried to stop her.

Eventually I just had to up and turn off Netflix because she had fallen into a food coma on the couch; her belly round and taut with two and a half boxes of Pizza Pie and the better portion of a baker’s dozen of bear claws. Not to mention the breadsticks and the soda. My Aunt had really pigged out that night—without even meaning to!

Her belly bulged outwards, easily in its second trimester of food pregnancy. It was shiny with sweat, and it churned audibly as it struggled to tackle the massive meal that my aunt had forced upon it. In her sleep, she clumsily moved her doughy arms to try and rub it in a futile attempt to soothe the monster tummyache that she had created. Her head lulled against her shoulder, a puddle of drool forming in the corner of her mouth as she let out tiny whimpers of pain in her quest to digest.

With nothing else to do with her—my fat ass couldn’t haul her fat ass to her bedroom—I grabbed the blanket off her bed and draped it over her, and called it a night.

Anyway, so things just sort of built on from there. It was a really subtle change, but as Fall faded into Winter and the weeks rolled on...

And, as it turns out, latching myself and my incredibly sedentary lifestyle onto my aunt was probably the last thing she needed if she ever wanted to get her figure back.

Because after spending an entire autumn adhered to the couch on the Mel Carlyle diet, there was no going back.

Between the two of us, we probably had the fattest asses in the county. All that time on our butts sitting down, eating take-out, and watching TV had done a number on us both in the dietary department. I think maybe, towards the end there, I may have gone two weeks without putting on actual clothes—just laying around in my pajamas all day, trying to keep myself at least somewhat decent. My Aunt at least had to get dressed to go to work, but her skirts and blazers came unbuttoned almost as soon as she was in the door before they were eventually replaced by roomier dresses that at least covered her titanic ass. And as the weeks went on, finding clothes that fit either of us were becoming a bit of an issue.

It all finally came to a head one Saturday morning in November. We had spent the night before trashing the apartment—Rhonda’s chique bachelorette pad had been trashed by about three day’s worth of takeout containers and boxes—and were just coming out of a night crashing on the couch.

“Mel.” My Aunt burped thickly, her sultry purr having been replaced by a curt thickness in tone as she chowed down on a hearty breakfast burrito from the microwave, “Remote.”

I had, in all honesty, never put on so much weight so quickly in my entire life. A life of constant exposure to TV and takeout food without much incentive to leave my seat had left me gaining so fast that nothing I owned could even hope to keep up with me. My t-shirts—even the big ones!—shied away from the herculean task of keeping my gut sheathed from the world. I was laying down on my end of the L-shaped couch, and my gut rose so high that not only could I not see the glass balcony door, I couldn’t see any light from the glass balcony door. My belly had gotten so huge that it was literally almost as tall standing up as it was big around.

“Ungh.” I whined, smacking my lips sleepily in an effort to get the donut glaze off of my lips, “You do it. You’re closer.”

I gave my aunt my practiced, best pouty-face ever. I’d like to think that my extra chins made me look extra adorable (even if I was rapidly eating myself towards necklessness). She still didn’t budge though.

“I pay bills.” My Aunt rose one of her eyebrows questioningly while she went to town on her breakfast burrito, “And I let you live here for free.”

There was a little standoff between us; my pouty princess face meeting her acquired resting mom face as we both silently argued as to who would be the one to get the remote this time. Netflix had done that stupid thing where it asked us if we were still watching—and neither of us were really in the mood to pry ourselves up even the few inches it would require to grab the remote.

“Fffffine.” My Aunt huffed, shoving the last of her burrito in her mouth, “I’ll do it. Again.”

My Aunt had probably been hit a lot harder than I had been by our season of immobility. When she sat in her spot on the couch, I was about ninety percent sure that her ass and thighs were about as big around as one of the cushions. Like, I could see no cushion where she sat down. Her pajamas had slowly moved away from “sexy” and had officially become more “oh my god these fit me.” Gone were her boyshorts and tank tops of the Summer, and Winter had brought in frumpy gray men’s shirts and a pair of spandex gym shorts built for a hippopotamus. Or, at least, a hippopotamus’ ass.

As she sat in her fixed position on the couch, her belly surged deep into her lap. It had collapsed into two very distinctive folds with a matching set of lovehandles that granted her an impressive muffintop—akin more to banana bread now that she was officially more waist than chest. My aunt had gotten so fat that she officially had to brace herself against the back of the couch to give her enough support to lift that massive ass of hers.

It was this huge thing that stuck out, I swear to god, almost a foot behind her—and that’s counting backfat too. Living with my Aunt had turned her into a complete porker; and what’s worse, my life was so much fun that she couldn’t even be bothered to do anything about it. She had to arch her back and lean over to get the remote—god, even her arms had gotten all fat—and she gave me the nastiest look the whole time like I’d made her go jog or something.

“I swear…” she said with great strain, her belly brushing against the coffee table as she leaned over, “The things that I—“

RIIIIIIIIP

My eyes widened as my Aunt’s puffy face grew red. I did my best to stifle a giggle, but to no avail. I had a prime view of what had happened too—thanks to the fact that I was smart enough to not get up.

My Aunt had split her sweats right down the middle; giving light to a pair of tight pink panties that looked to have seen far better days. Her hands shot to protect her dignity, leaking out in a diamond-shaped rift in the fabric of her sweats, but found that not only was the hole too big to cover, but her butt was too big around for her to reach it adequately. I could hear her struggle to stay hunched over, breathing heavily already as she rocked uneasily as all that junk inside her trunk weighed her down.

"Maybe I should have gotten it this time..." I said cheekily, reaching out with my wide wobbly arms to pat my Aunt on her fat tank of an ass

1431132311123212132212211212221331123.content:
"Are you KIDDING me?" I shouted excitedly from the couch, as my Aunt beamed at me.

"Yup. Paperwork finally went through yesterday... I couldn't believe it! I basically have to come in once or twice a month for business meetings, but for the most part, I'll be around here!" Honestly, she seemed more excited than I was. Since Lily was pretty preoccupied most of the time with her new lady, old Auntie dearest (more like Auntie rearest, hey-ooo) had become more of a best friend than Lily. Which was fine and all, family was important- plus, last I checked, Rhonda didn't have much of an after-work life. She pretty much came home and chilled/chomped with me, hence her currently curvaceous form.

"Well hot damn, how are we gonna celebrate?" I asked, while she casually bobbed on the heels of her feet, which put her entire body wobbling- Sheesh, I could almost hear her fat ass wobbling!

"I'm well ahead of you, girlfriend! I maaaaay have swung by Apple Dumpling's last night, I'm shocked you didn't smell it, to be honest." And with that, she wobbled off briefly, before making her way back with five pastry boxes, stacked perilously on top of each other, each adorned with a smiling anthropomorphic apple. "They tried to tell me that I had to order ahead to get my order, can you believe it? Eventually their manager gave up, I even snagged a 10% discount." Rhonda dumped the boxes unceremoniously in front of me on the coffee table. "We're gonna need some milk for these- you better cue up something good on Netflix, I need some background noise while I work on my reports."

Long story short, the pastries were gone before noon. Oddly enough, I probably only ate, like, a box and a half. Two, tops. Serious! I was still hungry. Turns out, maybe I wasn't the ONLY reason Rhonda had become rotund. She was a serious work-eater. Her right had was committed her mouse while her left hand was committed to jamming doughnut after fritter after bear claw into her ever-working mouth. No wonder her ass had grown too wide for cushions.

I couldn't take more than an hour before I had to complain. "Look, I need lunch. Seriously. You want anything, or... Uh, have ideas?" I asked, somewhat begging. Let's be real, I don't have the cash, or the energy, to get something to eat. However, it seemed Rhonda didn't either, at least on the energy side.

"Jeeze, we just urp finished those pasteries, but my purse is on the table, just grab my card and get something, okay? Take my car, too, I gotta take care of this."

Holy shit. Access to the car AND the card? Hell, fucking, yes. "I'll be back soon, okay?" And with that, I was off. Off with freedom, off with unlimited money, off with... No idea what to get. Lucky for me, there was the fast-food equivalent of the Las Vegas strip not even two blocks from my super-rad Rhonda's house, and within a half hour, I had the front seat- and part of the back seat, as well- loaded with fast food. I hadn't even looked at the receipts, just drove, ordered, and grabbed. The car smelled of grease, the card was hot from swipes, but I had easily overloaded the car with calories, and as I huffed and puffed through the doorway with load number one (of, I had estimated, four), Aunt Rhonda closed her laptop, which was alarming.

Only for her to say, "What took you so long?"

The food didn't stand a chance.

14311323111232121322122112122213311232.content:
So, like I said, I can't really talk. But the thing is, I liked being fat. I loved it. I lived for it, in fact. But I was pretty sure that all my Aunt had done was completely forgot that, you know, when you eat too much, you get fat.

That, and it's kinda hard to stay full when your Aunt is eating more than you...

I should've been in heaven, what with tons of greasy treats within reach. But the thing is, Rhonda was snagging bags almost faster than I could reach for them- I mean, the woman ate an entire double bacon cheeseburger in three bites! And the way she was hitting those fries, holy shit! As I grabbed one of the sodas, I actually took a break to watch her eat. I would almost feel impressed if I wasn't also being actively cheated out of glorious calories. And so, I decided to say something. "Say, uh, Rhonda? You... Okay?" I asked, kind of dumbly. She obviously was fine, if the rate she was eating was any indication.

"Yeah, just tryin' to eat quickly before I get back to work..." She muttered before throwing three chicken nuggets into her mouth.

I wasn't quite sure where to go with this. "Oh, yeah, uh, is work kinda... Stressful?" I asked, feeling more awkward by the second. To calm my nerves, I grabbed a large fries and began mowing down.

Rhonda sighed- actually fucking sighed and finished off the last of the chicken nuggets. "Look, I- I just have a lot on my plate, okay? Seriously, I honestly wanted to work from home so I could avoid people bugging me while I was trying to get work done, this stuff is so stressful. I just wanna eat my lunch and get back to work, okay?"

I was taken aback. I thought we were doing alright here, but damn- either she was in serious denial about her weight, or she was legitimately stressed out. I put my arms up in mock surrender. "Sheesh, sorry I asked!" She didn't have to get all bitch mode on me.

"Yeah, it's fine. I'm sorry for snapping at you, I just need to get back to it." Well, that was as good as it was gonna get. Guess I'd just need to be a bit more aggressive with my food grabbing.

Of course, in the end, it didn't really make much of a difference. Even with my Aunt and I growing our appetites by mach speeds throughout the previous months, we were no match for the pounds of greasy garbage I brought home. I was half asleep, food coma coming on strong, when I heard the click of a laptop opening. I opened my eyes to see my Aunt, casually leaning back and resting her laptop on her generous gut. And, I guess she didn't know I was awake, because I watched her grab her flab and grin. Okay, she definitely knew about her gain... Did she like it?

Maybe it was family related... I'd have to test my theory later. For now, I just let me stomach grumble as it digested and fell back asleep. I couldn't get anything done while I was stuffed stupid...

143113231112321213221221121222133112321.content:
So it didn’t exactly take a lot of effort to convince my Aunt to get off her butt and come out into the world with me, especially once I made the very valid argument that I didn’t have any clothes that fit me anymore. Once I mentioned in passing that the Boutique Grande-Belle (the only place in probably the whole state that could cater to a girl of my significant size) was right down the road from the Big Burger that Lily and I used to go to all the time, convincing my aunt became an effortless endeavor.

But I wasn’t lying about the whole “no clothes” thing; I really had eaten my way out of my latest wardrobe. Since Aunt Rhonda had slowly but surely become just as lazy as I was, that meant that we were both procrastinating in making sure that my beautiful blubber had some cover. That isn’t to say that she was faring any better, what with her increasingly rapid—and suspicious!—weight gain. We both just had to throw on whatever we could find, and hope that we didn’t run into any familiar faces.

Thankfully I managed to walk away with some nicer clothing before we left. Well, before Aunt Rhonda dragged me out of the store. I got a new top, a sweater, some jeans, a pair of leggings (I know, right?!), some sweats, and a big comfy hoodie. It wasn’t much but it offered enough variety to keep me clothed for a while. At least, until I put on another forty pounds…

I would have gotten more, but my Aunt wouldn’t have any more waiting. She’d picked out all her clothes—mostly blazers, skirts, and a pair of cute yoga pants that I talked her into—and was waiting on me to waddle my fat ass in and out of the dressing room with increasing frustration. Long before I was ever really “done” (as if I ever got tired of an excuse to check out how fat I was getting) she took me by the hand and lead me to the checkout counter, ending my shopping spree before it could ever really begin in favor of getting us out.

Within five minutes of swiping her credit card, my Aunt and I were looking for a booth in the Big Burger.

“Thank gawd.” My aunt puffed as she plopped down into her seat, still stuffed like a sausage into her old Apple Dumplin’s t-shirt, the one that had once upon a time been far too big for her, “I thought I’d never get you out of there.”

So I was a little pouty at being forcibly taken out of the Boutique so early, but this is what I wanted, right? Food!

No, shit…

To see if my Aunt Rhonda was really a closet feedee. Right. Sorry.

I wanted to get her here, to the Big Burger, because I wanted to test my hypothesis. I had noticed that my Aunt Rhonda was beginning to take too kindly to my lazy life of indulgence, and I had begun to make my own theories about why. She’d been ordering more and more food, and doing her best to take the lion’s share for herself—plus I had actually caught her manhanding her belly with a big smile on her face when she thought I was “sleeping”. Seems like pretty damning evidence, right?

Well, over the course of our little auntie-niece luncheon…

1431132311123212132212211212221331123213.content:
"Helloooooo-" Our server began, her cheerful demeanor not even slipping a smidgen as she practically skipped over to our table. She must have known by my- err, our sizes that this wasn't going to be a quick table, but the bill (and by association, tip) would sure be more than enough to justify the effort. "Welcome to Big Burger, my name is Sally- and I'm gonna go ahead and say you've been here before!" Jeeze, the smile on this girl's face could've melted an iceberg, with how warm it was. Truth be told, we had been here, about a dozen times, but she had no way of knowing- I'd remember this server anywhere. She was one of those "pear shapes"- you know, she's got a skinny face, modest waist, practically no boobs- but holy shit if her hips and ass weren't wide enough to catch anyone's eye.

"Yes, and I know exactly what I want to start with." Wow, Aunt Rhonda wasn't messing around today. "And I know what she wants, too. I'll have the double BBQ burger with onion rings AND the fries, and she'll have the double olive and onion burger, extra swiss, with fries and onion rings as well. On top of that, we'd both like a chocolate malt, and... Hmm, Mel, you want the mozzarella sticks or the fried pickles as the appetizer?" I kinda blanked, to be honest. I was watching our server's face. You see, I know there are three kinds of people in this world in relation to women like me. There are:

-Those who are disgusted, and make no show of hiding it.

-Those who are ambivalent, but care enough about what people think, so they hide it.

OR

-Those who love extra padding, and want to see more of it.

And this girl definitely fell into category three. You could tell by the face she made when my auntie-dearest ordered 60$ of food "to start with", how she didn't even try to pretend we weren't connoisseurs of this fine dining establishment, and the way she didn't even hesitate to write down every single bit of food my aunt demanded the second the words left her mouth. And it certainly didn't stop there.

We were about two minutes into our appetizers (Aunt Rhonda ended up getting both, of course)- my mind was struggling to focus on the original game plant, to measure Aunt Rhonda's gluttony and maybe get to the bottom of it, when Sally returned with our drinks. "Sooo..." She began, as if unsure of how to word it. I quickly counted the malts on the platter- lo and behold, there were three, not two, along with those fancy metal cups that they mix them in, you know, where they leave the extra. "We had a table walk out. So here's your malts-" She deposited the drinks in front of us, and as I suspected, both sets of cups were filled to the brim. "-and here's their malt- it's banana chocolate, but I figured at least one of you would enjoy it! Anyways, food should be out soon!" And with that, she sauntered away.

And I couldn't help but stare! I mean, damn, for a pretty small girl, that ass was out of control! I found myself idly wondering how people with that awkward body shape buy pants, before Aunt Rhonda had the audacity to steal some pickles off my plate. "HEY!" I shouted a bit more loudly than I intended, which caused Sally to whip her head around and stare at us. I quickly diverted my stare at her posterior.

"Wow!" My aunt laughed. "When you start paying for food, I give you full permission to steal off my plate." She laughed- I scowled, playfully.

"You're gonna regret that!" I muttered, quickly scarfing down the remnants of my plate.

-----

Well, long story short, my brain kinda forgot why I was there in the first place- to surveil on Rhonda. See, it didn't stop with the malts. When our burgers came out, we got an extra plate of fries. When we were wrapping up, we got refills on our malts (something I know from experience isn't practice at Big Burger). Hell, I was coming close to being stuffed, while Rhonda was looking a bit worse for wear. We were both breathing heavier than usual- I was letting out low belches while Rhonda's cheeks puffed out every now and then- she wasn't as unashamed as myself.

By the time the check came, I had completely forgotten about Rhonda- I was more interested in Sally. I could see her saying something through that little swingy-door that leads to the back kitchen, before she came to pick up the check. And when she came to the table to grab it, she was carrying a take-out bag that looked pretty darn full. "These are some leftovers that we were just going to toss, but I figured you ladies could have them!" She sounded as cheerful as ever, but there was a slight undertone to her voice that I couldn't quite place. She thrust the bag into my hands while grabbing the cash from my aunt, who assured her she could keep the change.

As we started to slowly walk/waddle our way to the exit, I decided to check the bag. There was a lot of stuff in there- some cookies, a slice of their pie (their fucking amazing apple pie, that is), a container of- judging by the smell- bleu cheese chicken wings. And to top it all off...
1431132311123212132212211212221331123213.title: Sally Ain't so Subtle.

1431132311123212132212211212221331123213.content:
And to top it all off, there was this note in the bag, written in the same curly pink handwriting that Sally had used to write our bill in, that said “text me?”, followed by a phone number.

I. Fucking. Called it.

Like, proverbially. That is to say “I knew she was a fucking chubby chaser, I knew it knew it knew it!”, but I digress. I did actually call her though.

I mean, was it weird? A little, yeah. Sally looked to be a little older than me, maybe early-mid twenties, and I hadn’t exactly known her as anything other than a waitress at Big Burger. But I’ll be honest when I say that I was getting a little bored of just me and my aunt laying around stuffing our faces—without Lily around, my social circle had taken a low blow, taking me from “two people in the whole state” to “my aunt, who I sometimes fight over food with”. I hadn’t been asked out on a date since Christmas Break in my Junior year, I figured, y’know, why ask to many questions?

As much as I would have liked to say that I texted her right then and there, I was a little preoccupied with all the goodies that Sally sent us home. Despite being pretty friggin’ full, I managed to snack on some of the more tantalizing tidbits of her little gift. By the time we made it home, my Aunt and I had put a pretty big dent in the bag’s contents, with her snagging half the apple pie slices (I trained her too well!) and splitting most of the cookies with me. We weren’t fifteen minutes into our customary post-binge-episode-of-whatever on Netflix before the bag was completely decimated.

If you want the truth, I was more focused on trying to remember the exact curvature of Sally’s big booty in her uniform than I was with trying to figure out my attraction to Tenant’s Kilgrave. I don’t know if it was because I was lonely, or if it was because she was the first person to give me any sort of romantic attention since I’d moved down here, but I couldn’t get that girl out of my head.

By the time my aunt had lapsed into a food coma, cradling her distended gut with the tender love and care of a bonafide piglet, it was a little after midnight—just one episode of Jessica Jones into the night.

I knew it was a little late, but I couldn’t resist. I hadn’t felt butterflies in my stomach like that in a while. I whipped out my phone and started tapping away.

“Hey it’s Mel from Big Burger.” I texted, deleting and rewriting several times over, “Thanks again for all that yummy food ;)”

I expected to have to wait, since she was still probably closing the store, but I got a response almost immediately.

“Your welcome cutey” she sent back, “I love spoiling my best customers”

“Well its allllll gone.”, I bit my lower lip as I continued forward, my confidence soaring as I failed to keep my smile in check, “We ate it all up!”

“No way :o”

I reached for the bag, struggling against my oceanic gut, and took a quick picture of the crumb-dusted but otherwise empty contents. I forwarded it to her.

“Send moar? I’m still REALLY hungry :c” I sent with a picture of my face, making this overexaggerated puppy-dog pout, “My mean old aunt only let me eat half of it…”

Sally’s next message took a bit longer than the others to come, making me a little worried. Was coming across as too forward? I mean, she was pretty forward, but did that mean I should have been too? What if I scared her off, y’know? That sort of thing.

As I lifted the bag over my head and sucked down the crumbs from the bag nervously, I got Sally’s response…

So let me just say that I don’t usually do stuff like this.

Didn’t do stuff like this.

But goddamn, it had been so long since I had done anything other than lay around with my aunt and watch TV. Losing Lily to her relationship with Marie meant that I had literally no one else to talk to and nothing else to do with my time. Sure there was Facebook, but that only did so much to keep me from feeling like a total shut in. I hadn’t talked to anyone since Wednesday Steinway in eleventh grade, and Sally was really cute…

So I hopped my fat ass on the nearest train headed downtown, and made sure to look damn hungry.

I didn’t even bother putting on any nice clothes or anything. I didn’t think that Sally was too focused on what I was wearing—just that I’d be popping out of it. I tossed a sweater onto myself, rolling it down my spherical expanse as I struggled to dress at my size. I was getting so fat that my arms ached from lifting them to squeeze them through the sausage-casing sleeves, and I was way too big in the belly to be covered by that little thing. It had stopped fitting maybe twenty pounds ago. I was parading around town with the entirety of my muffin top flopping out, but I may have hiked it up a bit once I reached Sally’s apartment. That and my leggings; I purposely shimmied them down over my gut, giving anyone and everyone clear view of the heavy fold of where my belly button used to be.

The door opened to reveal Sally, having changed out of her Big Burger uniform and into a pair of ass-hugging jeans and a Gamecocks hoodie.

“Hey.” I tried not to seem too eager

“Hey.” She purred back, “Come on in…”
1431132311123212132212211212221331123213.title: Sally Sweeps me Off My Feet

1431132311123212132212211212221331123213.content:
Okay! Pizza! That was a good start, right?

I mean, why shouldn’t we have started out over dinner? People did it all the time!

I waddled into Sally’s apartment and eased myself down on her couch. It was surprisingly comfortable, given my past (present, and future!) difficulties with other people’s furniture at my size. Even as I struggled to remain graceful, however, the springs beneath the sofa began to groan in agony as soon as my fat ass seemed to touch them. Given the circumstances, it wasn’t quite so bad. It was loud though, and I wanted to at least look polite…

“Sorry.” I said half-heartedly as I nestled down deeper into the couch. I gave my gut a loving little pet as I spread my legs that much farther apart than they already were, making it surge outwards as it pooled off of the sofa, “Hope you don’t mind a little noise.”

“Not at all.” Sally purred, biting her bottom lip as she seemed to drink in the sight of me, beached on her couch, “I’m going to go get the pizza. You just wait right there, okay?”

Sally sauntered into the other room, presumably the kitchen, while I did everything I could to at least appear like I wasn’t desperate. Her gait was slow and sensual, her wide hips and full cheeks bouncing up and down as she purposefully put a little extra wiggle into her step. Once she reached the doorway, she craned her head backwards to see if I was, indeed, watching her walk and she smiled. Her brown eyes seemed to twinkle, even in the sad bachelorette-pad lighting.

Oh God I was hot.

This girl—this Sally chick that I had only just formally met a few hours ago—god she knew how to turn my crank. I’d been tingling ever since I sat down, sparking from the way she looked me up and down. Watching her big round ass move and shake the way it did, listening to the soft contours of her voice, rereading those texts we’d sent each other all the way over? I was getting hornier by the second, and the unmistakable smell of cheese and grease lingering in the air wasn’t making things any easier…

“Okay Mel, here it is…”

1431132311123212132212211212221331123213.content:
“What’s wrong, fatty?” she asked me in this high-pitched tone of faux concern, “Don’t you like to eat?”

My eyes were locked on the greasy triangle of sauce and cheese as she held it above my head, dangling it just over my nose as my eyes widened and my heart raced. Instinctively I bit at it, my teeth clicking together as she yanked it just out of reach teasingly. A frustrated whine escaped from deep inside me, before she lowered it lovingly into my mouth. I hadn’t had Pizza Pie! in so long, and Sally teasing me with all this food was quickly taking me from “tingly” to “wet”.

“I… I do…” I huffed as Sally returned to the sofa with another box, one of ten, “But this is a lot, don’t you think?”

“Mmmmmaaaaybe.” Sally said coquettishly, her smile widening as she picked out another particularly tantalizing piece, “But I’ve been watching you, Melly. Ever since you came in with your roly-poly little friend. For any other fat girl this might be totally out of their range, like your pet redhead. But you—“

I felt a spark beneath my belly as Sally’s hand came to touch the exposed portion of my tummy. Instinctively, my mouth opened to accept Sally’s slice, my breathing labored with lust. She fingered the crest of where my belly pooched out of my leggings; I arched my back as I began to grow damp.

“—you’re just greedy enough to make it happen.” She purred, “Aren’t you?”

The Oolong Buffet was probably one of the best Chinese places in town. My Aunt and I had gone there a couple of times, back when she was still skinny, and I’d heard Lily gush about it here and there on the off chance that I got to talk to her. It wasn’t exactly the nicest place—most buffets aren’t—but I decided to get just a little dressed up. Just a little, y’know? This would be the first time that I had actually gotten to see Sally in what felt like forever. I didn’t want to give the impression that I was some doubty fat girl who couldn’t fix myself up despite her size.

Like I said, I left about thirty minutes early to accommodate for any potential sweat-related anxiety. It was getting warm again, which meant that I had to plan accordingly. I put on a flowy top (well, it used to be flowy) that was made of some really comfortable material. Once upon a time, right after I had gotten out of Buttercombe, it was one of my best-fitting Summer shirts. But after nearly another year of gain, it had begun to fall short of expectation. Whereas before it managed to cover my swollen tits and engorged gut with ease, my ample gain meant that I was testing its limits. Instead of covering my belly and coming down to touch the top of my thighs, it now stopped squarely at the outermost edge of my stomach, right at my widest, and left a creamy white ring of pudge for all to see.

My leggings, custom ordered from a site an old Buttercombe alum showed me, seemed to be showing their age despite faring better than any of my tops. These were the same brand that I had worn to Sally’s that night, and while those handled pretty well all things considered, I knew that if things continued with Sally like I thoughthoped that they would, I’d need to order another size or so up. These ones were the same size as what I had worn to her place on our first night together, and they barely managed to hold me in after everything that I had eaten. Which meant good news, that they would probably still hold me for another twenty pounds or so, but unless I wanted to start eating without pants on (any more than I already did), I would need to go ahead and plan accordingly…

I hadn’t put on any makeup at home because I would have just sweat it off on the walk over, so I made myself up in the bathroom. Nothing too fancy—I was never too big on makeup. Some eyeliner, a little lipstick, and I was more or less good to go with about five minutes to spare.

I claimed our table (booths and I did not get along at my size!) and I was seen by our waitress and I confirmed the party and blah blah blah. The reservation was under Carlyle, and I told the hostess to be on the lookout for a redhead with a fine ass, because that was my date. She nodded, smiled, and asked me if I wanted to go ahead and get myself something to eat.

“Nah, I think I’ll wait. Don’t want to spoil my appetite or anything.” I gave the waitress a wink as she placed my drink down in front of me, “As if that’s possible, right?”

So there I was—sexy, confident land whale about to meet up with her girlfriend for the first time in almost a week. I had even showed up early and everything! But soon the clock struck 7, and there was no sign of Sally to be seen. And then it was five after, and then ten after… I got a little worried!

And, you know, I… I had been sitting in this restaurant, surrounded by all the wonderful smells that hung thickly in the air. The sound of dishware clinking against each other, plates clunking against tables as overfed patrons plopped themselves down for meals with their fat families. I could hear the sizzling of the grill in the back and… and it was making me a little wet.

I had purposely held myself back from stuffing myself like a piggy so I could give Sally a show. I had even let my Aunt finish off our lunch and forgone our early dinner so I would have plenty of room. So when she wasn’t there, and I had done all that walking, and my tummy was so empty, I just… well, I figured, what was the harm in getting started without her?

I got up and waddled over to the service bar, where all these delicious, greasy foods were just plopped in front of me, ripe for the taking. I felt my mouth water before I even realized that I was salivating, my belly oozing and pouring onto the rim of the bar. I grabbed a plate—just one!—and got myself something to snack on; a little pile of lo mein and some eggrolls. No big deal, right?

I was suckling on my second eggroll before I even sat down, the cushioned seats deflating beneath my ass as I plopped down. They were so good; I drowned the third little sucker in soy sauce and crunched it between my teeth while I worked on his youngest brother. And then I just started chowing down on the lo mein—those greasy noodles were greeeat. I had gone so long without food, hours by that point, that my synapses started to sizzle at the hint of a stuffing soon to come. I was so excited, so eager to begin my binging that I hardly noticed when I dropped a noodle on my chest.

“Oh no…” I whined, putting my fork back on my now-empty plate, “My shirt…”

It was ruined, at least as far as the evening went. Orange-brown sauce outlined the wriggly curves of the noodle, ruining my top. I tried to wipe it off, you know to see if it was so dark because there was still grease on it or something, but my hands were still sticky with soy sauce! I had made it even worse, and Sally was due any minute!

“Gotta fix this…” I mumbled huskily to myself as I braced myself for getting up.

And I was totally going to do that. I swear. I was going to go to the bathroom, take off my shirt, and rinse it off in the sink really quick before I used one of those hand-jet things to dry it off. It might not have worked completely, but it would have at least made some of the damage that I had already done a little less obvious…

But my intentions only lasted as soon as I saw the buffet lines. All that delicious, greasy shit sitting in pans, glistening underneath heat lamps? On an empty stomach? I spent more time than I should have just staring, gawking, trying not to just give into my baser instincts. My mouth was salivating, I enviously watched some chunky Asian guy sneak a bite of chicken before piling his plate high with the stuff. My gut gurgled greedily, demanding that I satisfy her. I put my hands on its drastic outward curve, inadvertently spreading the stains to my flanks. I was so hot, smacking my lips like the hungry cow that I was as I tried to resist the sweet siren song of the unlimited buffet…

And then they put out the sweet and sour chicken.

I went fucking ballistic. I changed my course right that fucking second and got a tray with four plates on it. I stacked them high with as much greasy, fatty shit as it could handle. I stacked shit on top of shit. No entrée, no sides, just fucking food. All of it a messy disorganized gorge in front of me.

I sat back down and started stuffing my face. Loudly. I just ate and ate and ate, bite after bite going to fuel my heightened appetites. How could Sally have expected me to go this long without eating? She should have known that a big, greedy girl like me couldn’t have held off on eating while she whatevered the time away. I was a mess, a big fat mess, who completely ignored the family atmosphere of the buffet as I started moaning while I ate.

I… have some regrets about that. But that came later.

I swear, I binged for an hour. Sally was so fucking late, but I didn’t care. Being with her, after our first night together, my eating switch had been flipped on. I didn’t care who was around me, I didn’t care who watched, I just wanted to stuff my fat face until I couldn’t stuff my fat face anymore. And then have someone stroke me and call me a fatty or an oinker or a cow or whatever and then coax me into eating even more, more, more…

That’s… healthy, right?

Anyway, like I said, I binged for what literally became an hour before…

1431132311123212132212211212221331123213.content:
So there are times, in mostly every person's life, where they get stood up. Some people go home and get drunk, some people just shrug it off, some people go apeshit at whoever it was that stood them up.

I just ate. I mean, look, it was kind of a perfect storm type situation, I had an elevated level of emotions, and there was a lot of food around me. Look, a perfect storm with me in general is just a lot of food, period.

I kind of went off the deep end, and I think it was around the point where I was just grabbing egg rolls off a platter and eating them standing up that I sort of came out of my psuedo-trance. I glanced down at my shirt, which was now a far cry from "presentable"- it was coated with crumbs that were stuck to probably every single Asian-style sauce imaginable, which meant my front was essentially a rainbow of high-sodium, high-MSG content. Perfect.

I munched down on the last egg roll and tried to take stock of where I was at. I definitely wasn't like, so stuffed that it hurt, but I knew from experience I was about two plates away from that point. So naturally, I grabbed three.

This wasn't just a sad binge, this was a fuckin' bender. There were a lot of logistics I hadn't quite worked out yet, such as:

How I was going to get home

How I was going to even get out of this building

How I was going to explain to my aunt why I looked like I feel into a dumpster filled exclusive with chinese food.


But those were all at the back of my mind- for now, I just wanted to gorge until I felt like splitting open.

Then it was basically brief periods of lucidness in between bouts of one of the most aggressive stuffings I've partook in in quite some time. Later, on reflection, I'd realize that it wasn't even entirely anger at getting stood up - it was just sexual frustration. The things I had felt the other day with Sally was beyond anything I had physically experienced and the thought of it happening again, alongside the sting of getting bailed on- well, it just kind of turned into a weird sexually frustrated food fuck-fest.

So at some point, about 4 plates past where I probably should've stopped, there was a sharp tickling on my leg- I looked down and of course my fucking leggings now had a massive split down the side. I let out a sigh that immediately turned into an aggressive belch- and that's when I really felt how full I was. I immediately let out several more belches, which did nothing to help with the incredibly pain and pressure in my gut. It was like I had swallowed a molotov cocktail- I was sweating, something I hadn't even realized, and my previous moans of pleasure from the abundance of food in front of me were now non-stop grunts of horrible discomfort. Belching wasn't doing anything, and when I briefly tried to rub my gut in a way that always helped, even the gentlest strokes felt like sharp punches to my insanely engorged gut.

After that, I kind of lost sense of time. My head lulled back and I normally would've felt embarrassed - not because of my overstuffed state, but, I dunno, passing out at a buffet was probably a low point for me. At some point, I realized that it was now most definitely night-time, and a glance at the clock on the wall told me I had been here for over two hours. Which seemed like a long time, so I decided it was finally time to leave.

Lurching off from the table, I swallowed nervously. Standing was painful, with my body wanting to lean forward due to the large mass of food that was now resting firmly in my gut.

"Did you enjoy yourself?" The older woman at the front asked me without a trace of irony.

I put a fist to my mouth and belched, trying hard not to let it be as loud as it felt like it would be and failing miserably. "You could say that." I grunted as I slowly shuffled out the front door.

And there I was. I was so fucking full and fat and overwhelmed with the amount of greasy garbage that I had just shoveled into my body that I briefly considered sleeping on a bench rather than try walking home.

Then I thought about calling my Aunt, before realizing she had mentioned she was having a girls night with some ladies from work.

Then I thought about calling Sally.

Nope

Then I realized I had to call an Uber or something, and just hope that I didn't get someone with a Prius or whatever.

But when I looked at my phone, I saw about twenty missed calls. Slightly caught off guard, I realized I hadn't looked at my phone in two hours...

They were literally all from Sally.

There was also a voicemail, but I realized with a sinking feeling that I hadn't even bothered trying to see why she was late- I just stuffed my face on a whim. Oh God, what if something happened to her? Something serious?

I immediately called her.

1431132311123212132212211212221331123213.content:
…

…

…”Hello?”

“Sallyyyyyy?!”

Alright, I was pretty pathetic by that point. I had spent the last two hours (give or take) stuffing my face like I had never managed to stuff my face before. I was topped off to the point of popping, and I was a confused wreck of pain and embarrassment and relief that Sally was okay and that we were okay and I was so fucking horny, I just… I’m a whiner, okay?

“Hey Mel, I was wondering when you’d call…” Sally said, sounding a little relieved herself, “Is… everything okay?”

“No!” I moaned, “I’m stuffed and my tummy hurts and I can’t… I just can’t even!”

“You actually went out to eat without me?” Sally scoffed, more amused than offended, “You didn’t pick up because you were too busy pigging out on what was supposed to be our date?”

“Shut up! You weren’t answering and… and I thought you stood me up!” I bellowed into the receiver, all this talking was really taking the wind out of me, “I eat when I’m upset.”

“I would never stand you up, you big dumb dummy—there was a grease fire at Big Burger, I got held up.” Sally cooed, “My poor little piglet.”

“I’m poor. Come get me.”

***


I squeezed myself into a park bench while I waited for about half an hour for Sally to roll up, but with my super-stuffed state it felt much longer. I just sat there, cradling my belly and whimpering as city folk just sort’ve passed me by. Some gave me stares, other lingering looks of curiosity, but I paid them no mind. I was consumed entirely by the throbbing mass of mess stretching my stomach, drawing it tight and taut. The worst part was that, unlike in my own home, I couldn’t just up and take off my pants or roll up my top or whatever. I had to remain at least somewhat dressed, lest I be charged with public indecency. My poor tummy was doing its best to swell out of my sweater, but even as it pushed the hem further up on my gut, all it did was press tightly against the fabric. It may as well have been a miracle when Sally showed up, if only because that meant soon I would be able to slip out of those uncomfortable clothes.

“Ey gurl.” She said playfully, putting her car in park on the curb, “Headed my way?”

Sally drove a surprisingly large car. It wasn’t like, A-Team van or anything, but it was definitely a lot more vehicle than a bootylicious redhead like her needed. I mean, I didn’t exactly know her life story yet, but I didn’t think she was like, denmother to a bunch of girlscouts or anything. Why she needed all that space, I didn’t know. And frankly, I couldn’t bring myself to care since at the time, I was more food than girl.

“Omigawd yes.” I huffed, throwing my arms off my gut and pushing against the bench. Sally soon came to my assistance, and between the two of us, we gathered enough momentum to wrestle my thighs out from between the arms, “Save me.”

When I was standing, I could see Sally marveling at the size of my stomach. All that food had made it pretty big, and it was rock-hard… at least, where it wasn’t soft and jiggly. It was a big, two-tummy-tiered ball that came and went with my labored breathing. I winced as she put a hand on it, sizing me up like an overripened watermelon.

“Jesus, Mel.” She whistled, a familiar (and moistening) look in her eyes, “Maybe I need to stand you up more often—you seem to eat more by yourself than when I’m around!”

“Don’t… you dare…” I panted, touching the back of Sally’s hand with mine

My rambunctious redhead gave me a swift swat on my sizeable seat and opened the back doors so I could wobble into the back seat of her car. I found myself with plenty of room as I claimed the middle seat, the van somehow managing not to groan in agony as I lowered myself onto its suspension.

It was nice to have air-conditioning on my big sweaty gut. I’ll tell you that much.

Sally climbed back into the driver’s seat and put her steed into reverse.

“So… where we headed?” I asked weakly, “Now that, you know… we’re together?”

1431132311123212132212211212221331123213.content:
"Are you serious?" I asked incredulously, although, truth be told, it wasn't completely out of the question- for one thing, it had been over forty minutes since my buffet blowout, which meant I had managed to find a little room, maybe a quarter pounder and a shake? For another thing... Well, the night with Sally where I gorged myself was practically orgasmic even before, you know, the actual orgasming part.

"Hey, pig, it's not my fault you went overboard when I wasn't there to enjoy it..." Sally bit her lip. "And for another thing, I had a really long day, and it would definitely cheer me up..." She batted her eyelashes at me innocently, but I had a feeling that I was going to be eating whether I was up to it or not.

"I guess I could eat a small snack..." I burped loudly afterwards, emphasizing the point that I probably didn't need anything resembling a small snack. Sally just grinned. "But I'm sure as hell not getting out of this car." I said, and reclined my seat. "Wake me up when we get there..." I dozed off pretty damn quickly- honestly, I would've rather gone home and collapsed into bed, but I figured I needed to spend a little bit of time with Sally...

I woke up to a bag plopping into my lap, causing me to lurch up from my reclined state, my belly surging forward and pushing the bag onto the floor. "Good job, girl. A plus, seriously." I grunted as I snapped the seat out of it's reclined position and futilely reached my hands down to grab it, but of course my titanic tummy prevented anything more than pathetic grunting and arm waving.

"I got it, stop, you look so ridiculous!" Sally giggled as she lithely snatched the bag up and thrust it into my awaiting arms.

I opened the bag and saw a ton of fries. LIke, a shit-ton of fries. I reached in and felt around a bit... "Did you seriously buy three large fries?" I said, amazed, but still shoveled a handful into my mouth. "I mean..." I said with my mouth half-full of fries. "That's usually like, a mid-day snack for me, but..." Sally just stared at me, and that's when I saw there were two more bags sitting in her lap. I gulped the fries down nervously.

"Don't worry, there's variety..." She said with a grin, reaching into a bag and pulling out a burger. "Twenty-Five bucks gets you a lot of foooooood...." She waved the now unwrapped burger under my nose, and I instinctively took a bite out of it. "And I'm not taking you home until all of these bags are empty." I could tell by the look in her eyes that she was dead serious.

"Sally..." I groaned as I swallowed the burger. "I'll explooode..." I was only partially joking- while I was happily shoving french fries into my face, it was only an hour or so ago where I was so stuffed full of sodium soaked chicken, beef, rice and veggies that I thought I would literally pop, and now I apparently had several pounds of McDonalds to eat... But I also knew that if Sally was as into me as I figured she was, then talking about exploding would definitely push her buttons- and although it was fairly dark in the parking lot, and we were quickly moving past dusk territory, I could tell she was blushing.

"Well..." She said, her voice breathy, "I could watch you eat all night, so feel free to eat slow..." She reached out and began lightly rubbing my bloated gut as I went to town on the french fries. I let out a happy grunt as she rubbed my overwhelmed midsection, and began eating with renewed vigor.

Like most fast food feasts, despite my better judgement, the three bags that were overloaded with burgers, fries, chicken nuggets, and apple pies were quickly emptied, and if I thought I was a mess after my buffet binge, now I was really in rough shape. Despite Sally's loving rubs, my gut was now pulsing with pain, and if I was alone I'd almost certainly be miserable- but thankfully I had a helper who managed to rub out belches and hiccups while I tried my hardest not to pass out. I was vaguely aware of the car moving at some point, and when it stopped again I opened my eyes and saw stars.

Not figuratively, I mean it was now officially night. "Whaz- Whu..." I let out a belch that rattled the windows of the car and caused an excited giggle from Sally.

"It's after ten, dear." I groaned.

I basically had glutted myself to the max, twice, in three-ish hours. That was a pretty impressive night for me, at any rate. I was more of an "eat all day" kinda girl, rather than "overglut myself into a stupor every few hours" girl, to be honest- but that surely wasn't as entertaining for my sweetheart Sally. I tried to respond. "Yeah, well-" But another loud belch rumbled out of my gut before I could finish.

"Trust me..." Sally said lustily, "If I had my druthers, I'd make our night in the other day look like child's play, but, and trust me, this breaks my heart, I have to do a double shift tomorrow- we have a lot of cleaning to do after that stupid grease fire." I groaned, partially out of frustration, partially out of pain- my belly was gurgling like crazy trying to process the metric ton of grease I had shoveled into it.

"I'm gon'... I'm gonna need a... Day to digest, anyways..." I huffed as Sally slid her thick rear out the door and walked around to open my door for me- so chivalrous! "I... don't know if I could handle any... physical activity... Anyways..." I huffed as Sally helped me inch my way out of the car, which was an olympian feat in it's own right. I eyed the walk to my Aunt's and almost started sobbing. Every shuffling step was misery, since my center of mass felt like I had shotgunned ten pounds of ball bearings. Somehow, Sally managed to navigate me into the apartment and into my bed- thankfully, my Aunt still wasn't home from her night out.

I think we made out a bit, but by the time I was in bed and undressed I was starting to pass out- I distinctly recall her sweetly kissing my forehead before slipping out, though, and as I slipped into a bona-fide food coma I realized I was falling pretty hard for this girl, and fast.

1431132311123212132212211212221331123213.content:
The food coma ending up something more like hibernation. As if my body said, I see what she's been doing! Gotcha -- and went off to bed for as long as physically possible. This case meant about fourteen hours. When I woke up, around one or two, I checked my phone.

Text me when you wake up, piggy

You up?

:(

I quickly -- or as quickly as my pudgy fingers would allow -- replied back that I had just woken up. Not feeling too bad after not having heard from her last night for such a length, I left my phone and slowly, determined, pushed my stiff body up off the bed. Yawning loudly, I pat my belly which had returned to its naturally squishy demeanor. And yet, my hands missed the vague but obvious stiffness that came with being stuffed and as a gurgle and a growl came, I realize, I missed breakfast!

Guess I'll have to have a brunch twice the size as usual!

Today was the day Aunt Rhonda would go grocery shopping, and so I took no remorse in quite literally clearing out two cabinets and half the fridge. I would list for you what came out of there and went into my belly, since I know how much you, dear reader, loves to know what I stuff myself with, but the list would be too exhaustive and so I hope that knowing that my brunch lasted almost two hours clues you into how much food went into my gut.

I took another fifteen minutes to cradle my once more swollen and aching belly in my fluffy arms, and burping loudly, took that as a sign I should probably see if Sally had replied.

A four minute walk back to my room -- nothing. Nothing? What the fuck? NOTHING? This was fishy. I sent another text, something flirty along the lines of Just stuffed myself for you ;). I waited.

After a while I became hungry again and still no response! I huffed angrily. That fat-ass flat-chested jerk. Ugh. If this was the way our relationship was going to go, I might as well just go date the Burger King. He may not be real, but at least he's consistent. I cleared out another few cabinets and other half of the fridge (and freezer) for dinner, and, that's when I heard over the sound of my gas and chewing my ringtone from the other room. Sally?

Somehow I managed to get my fat ass up and over to the phone before the ringer stopped. I picked up. "Hello?"

"Mel?" she was crying, "Can I come over?"

While I was hoping to guilt her into bringing me food, I decided to simply tell her yes, quite emphatically (emfatically). I sat faithfully by the door, and, when she arrived, opened it. She ran straight into my arms. Conveniently, I felt the warmth of a bag of McDonalds on my left love handles, and the cold XL soda on my right love handles. That's what I call a perfect match.
