14311323133111212.content:
Look, I’ll be honest, I didn’t know shit about ‘aura.’

Like I told Lily, I wasn’t that much of what most people would call a “believer”—and that didn’t stop at the typical teenaged rebellion against my fairweather Christian mother, but extending into most religions. I was far too busy stuffing my face and masturbating to how fat I was to worry about metaphysical problems about auras and karmas and all that business.

All I knew for sure was that after I took my Aunt to the temple, I was getting waited on hand and foot and she was cooking more than… well, ever, since I’d never seen her show an interest in the art before then. There was a definite change in my Aunt’s behavior—something that everyone told me was because of some ‘aura’ mumbo-jumbo, but like I said I had more than a few reservations about all that—and that change was benefiting me more than I had really ever thought it would.

I would spend every day for the foreseeable future in my Aunt’s bachelorette pad, lounging around and eating takeout. Sometimes Lily would come over if she felt like skipping classes, and sometimes we’d go out to eat at one of the many restaurants that Lily’s “congregation” frequented. I’d usually be home in time for dinner, which had slowly become something of a spectacle at my Aunt’s home. Her booming social life slowly fizzled out as she seemed to become more and more obsessed with making sure that I was getting enough to eat; at first I was worried, but as the weeks flew by and I grew accustomed to such bountiful meals, this quickly became my new normal.

The only exceptions to my simple life of “ordinary” indulgences were Sundays, where my Aunt drove me to McGreevy Hall to meet up with Lily, her family, and the rest of the congregation. There I was given near constant attention and affection; praise and encouragement from Deena while I was waited on by the skinnies, who (I’ll admit) seemed to dote on me more and more as I continued to put on more weight. In an environment where I was encouraged to eat as much as I wanted and do as little for myself as possible in literally almost every constant in my life, was it any wonder that I had my reservations about trying to undo whatever this “goddess” thing was? I would have had to have been stupid not to take advantage of all this!

And that was before we started to go on Wednesday nights.

I was swelling up so fast that I might as well have been a big, fat balloon. With all the food that I was eating at almost every hour of the day, I was putting on weight at an unbelievable pace. My belly swung lower and farther in front of me during the increasingly rare occasions that I rose to my feet under my own power, constantly full as it bobbed before me. It had grown so big that, when full, I could no longer wrap my arms around it—and at this rate, it wouldn’t be long before I just straight up couldn’t do it, period. The angle at which I was forced to hold my arms grew alongside their relative flabbiness and the circumference of my enormous ass. I looked like I was slowly blowing up outwards, my chins bunching against one another as they lay rest on my fatted chest.

I could hardly believe that I was getting so big—it had taken me years to climb up to four hundred pounds at Buttercombe. I had idly imagined that moving out to South Carolina with my aunt would take me so far beyond that; to go so far beyond so quickly was a fucking dream come true!

After a few more weeks of the Ceres treatment, all this aura and shit…
14311323133111212.title: Seizing an Opportunity

choices: What can Deena teach me about using my aura?
Maybe Aunt Rhonda is the key.
143113231331112122.content:
“Melanie's out of ice cream!”

I held up the empty bowl and shook it a little for emphasis. I was the only one in the ice cream parlor right now – it was 3 in the afternoon and I had been there for close to two hours – but I got a kick out of watching how fast the staff jumped into action to get me some more food. I admit, I was pretty bratty; quick to demand more food, feeling entitled to having my every whim catered to.

Maybe if the people around me weren't so eager to please I wouldn't have gone as far as I did. After putting up with my mom's oppressive regime it felt great to be somewhere that not only didn't judge me but encouraged me for my gluttony and obesity. I would have been happy with simply having Aunt Rhonda enabling me and Deena and the rest of the congregation giving me a place to be myself, but the more I fell in with the Ceres worshipers the more everyone that came into my life wanted to keep me happy.

You remember when I mentioned seeing Kenji for the first time, and how the staff at the buffet was waiting on him? I was experiencing that for myself now. I could go into any restaurant or diner in town, plop my fat ass on a couple chairs (one chair wasn't enough anymore), and sit back while the staff brought me course after course of food. Half the time they didn't even remember to charge me; that was something no one in the church mentioned to me, but I wasn't going to question it.

Like right now. I was at a Coldstone Creamery, and the two girls behind the counter – Jessi and Teri – weren't ringing up what I was eating. They hadn't last time, either. I just ate until I was tired of ice cream (which took a while) then got up and went home for dinner. They didn't stop me, they didn't ask for money. They just smiled and watched me leave, almost awestruck by either my impressive girth or just by me.

I still didn't know what it was that was causing this. Yes, my 'aura' was the cause, but how did it work? Was my growing size making it stronger? If so, why didn't anyone outside the Ceres church ever mention how much fatter I was getting? Even Aunt Rhonda only talked about how much more I was eating than when I first came to live with her; the fact that I had outgrown my wardrobe four times over didn't register, only my expanded stomach capacity.

I felt sort of let down nobody was talking about my fat. Well, Lily did. She was both jealous and amazed at how fast I was growing, and Deena had taken a special interest in me. At the gatherings now she had me sit next to her, which I gathered was a place of honor among the congregants. But to have no one else mention that I was over seven hundred freaking pounds after just a couple months? It was frustrating, because that was what I was most proud of.

Yeah. 725 pounds. Believe it. I was so fat that when I went out of the apartment I had to turn my body and shuffled through the door, and when I got to a restaurant I need to aim for the middle of the double doors. Maneuvering around the apartment or a dining floor required all my concentration, because if I wasn't careful I could knock over a table with an errant waddle of my hip, or if I turned around too fast my wrecking ball ass or belly would knock someone to the ground.

Words can't describe how powerful it felt to be so big. Rather than feeling restricted, like I was stuck in a world not meant for me, I felt imposing. People had to clear out of my way lest they go sprawling to the floor. It was intoxicating, all my pleasure and primal arousal at the thought of my size magnified a hundred times, a thousand times as my body grew out in every direction. When I sat down (which was most of the time) my belly loomed before me, growing rounder as I filled it with food.

I was bigger than most of the other congregants now, and still growing. Deena explained at one point that even with Ceres' blessing everyone had a set limit to how big they could naturally be; it was why the skinnies doted on us fatties instead of trying to get bigger themselves, and it was why not everyone in the congregation reached the state of uber-obesity she had and I wanted.

So even in a group of fat-loving gluttons I was establishing myself as bigger and hungrier than them. Damn right.

No, I wasn't humble about it. Just as I was at the ice cream shop right now, taking every new dish with the feeling of entitlement that this was mine by virtue of me being me, so I was everywhere I went. Every restaurant's staff wanted to keep me fed, and I sat back and accepted it all. Even at home I was a selfish little witch, greedily gobbling up everything Aunt Rhonda made me and asking for more. She never complained, she never criticized my laziness, she just went back to work in the kitchen while I would slip a hand down to my snatch and pleasure myself while still eating.

I was in hog heaven, and I only wanted more.

1431132313311121222.content:
“Hey, Aunt Rhonda,” I said between mouthfuls of pasta that night, “I've been thinking. You spend so much time making me dinner every night, and on the weekends you spend all your time in the kitchen.”

“I love to cook for you,” she said. “You're a hungry girl, and you need to be fed.”

I smiled. 'Need to be fed.' Every time I thought I had reached the limits of my aura's power, I got a surprise like this.

“Thank you. You're so awesome like that. But you deserve your personal time, you know? When was the last time you went out with your friends, had a girl's night out?”

“Oh, I don't know.” Aunt Rhonda waved the idea off. "I can't take a night off. What would you do for dinner?”

“Well, I could always order in. Or maybe,” I pretended this idea had just occurred to me, “you could invite your friends over. Have them over for dinner, show off these mad skills you've been developing.”

“Maybe.” She turned the idea over in her head. “But it takes a lot to feed you. I wouldn't want to you go hungry because we had guests over.”

“I'll be fine,” I said. “You always make so much, and you should share this with your friends.”

“You really think so?”

“I really do,” I said, trying to will my aura to make Aunt Rhonda go along with this. I had no idea whether someone could control their aura consciously or not, but for the benefits I would reap from this I had to try.

Two nights later Aunt Rhonda's friends came to the apartment for dinner. She had left work earlier to make an even bigger spread of food than normal, almost fearful of leaving me wanting. I kept my amusement to myself; if this worked like I thought it would, I would have more than I knew what to do with.

While she was in the kitchen, putting a final glaze on a ham, I answered the door. I was wearing a pair of black biker shorts and a white tank top that couldn't even stretch past my breasts and first roll of flab. As far as dinner party attire went I was a travesty, but I was giddy at the thought of how Aunt Rhonda's friends would react.

There were three of them, and they had conveniently arrived at the same time. Emma, Jana and Patsy, they stood on the other side of the door and each fought to hide their shock at the sight of me. I think Emma had the easiest time; perhaps she had seen me out and about at some point. The other two did well enough; if I hadn't been looking for exactly that, I probably wouldn't have caught their initial disgust.

“You must be Aunt Rhonda's friends,” I said, smiling warmly. “I'm Melanie, call me Mel. I'm her niece; her sister is my mother. Please, come in.”

None of them wanted to be the one to say anything or otherwise disrupt the evening before it started, so they all came in and handed me their coats.

“Dinner's about to begin,” I said, pointing in the direction of the dining room. “Please have a seat.”

They went to the table while I hung up their coats, then went to join them. Instead of a regular seat I had a thick bench, something Aunt Rhonda had purchased a while ago after I had broken two of her chairs (at the same time). I had to sit back a ways from the table, because my belly was just too large for me. When we started eating I would lean forward, no doubt looking more like a hog than I already did. Normally I would just bring the table up to my breasts and use them as a makeshift table, but I wanted to emphasize my obesity and my appetite as much as possible. Might give my aura an extra kick, I figured.

Aunt Rhonda and the others made small talk, the guests divining quickly that I was not a conversationalist while a meal was going on, and I happily ate away. For the next 45 minutes I lost myself in my first-dinner haze, filling and emptying countless plates of food and oblivious to the others around me.

It was after the ham was gone, along with half the chicken-fried steaks, that I started to come out of my fugue. Eating a bit slower now, I looked around at the other women still sitting at the table. They had long since finished their own meals, but Aunt Rhonda wouldn't get up until I was finished and the others were too polite to get up and leave.

And there was something else. It was subtle, but after seeing it in dozens of people it was like a bright neon sign to me. They were waiting; waiting for something they probably didn't understand, waiting to do or be called to do something they couldn't articulate.

Oh god, I thought to myself, or should that be goddess? This was going to work.

“This is the best meal you've ever made, Aunt Rhonda,” I said when a lull in the conversation presented itself. Her expression lit up as she turned to me.

“You think so? What do you think of the potatoes? I was trying something new with them.”

“Oh, they were the best. We don't have any more, do we?”

“I can whip some up,” she said, already getting to her feet. Her role as hostess was forgotten in light of my need for more food. Awesome, but what was even more awesome was what came next.

“You know,” Emma said, “I remember a recipe my grandmother had for poppy seed bread. Would you mind some help?”

“Not at all.”

Jana and Patsy were only a few seconds behind them, saying something about not wanting to sit around. I stayed where I was and kept eating, elated things were turning out better than I expected. I had thought Aunt Rhonda might ask for some help in the kitchen, but even that wasn't needed. The other women fell in line after less than an hour in the same room as me.

Aunt Rhonda's fears about me going hungry came to nothing, as she and her friends spent another hour and a half working the kitchen and bringing me more food. I wondered how the others rationalized spending their evening feeding a complete stranger like this. Emma in particular threw herself into her work. I made a note to myself to ask Deena about that later, whether some skinnies were more devoted than others.

The other women left after they were convinced they had had enough, leaving me to wait to find out just how powerful these effects really were.
1431132313311121222.title: Maybe Aunt Rhonda is the key.

14311323133111212222.content:
I found out the next morning. It was my habit to sleep as long as I wanted, which was often until my belly was completely empty and crying out for food, but today I was woken up around 7:30 by Aunt Rhonda.

“Sorry for disturbing you,” she said, “but Emma came by to pick me up, and she wanted to see you.”

Standing in the doorway of my room was Emma, holding a stack of Tupperware boxes.

“My grandmother ran a restaurant in Charleston for a few decades, and when she passed away I ended up with her recipe books. I always meant to dive into them and learn to cook myself, but it wasn't until last night that I had a real desire to try. I made some doughnuts, they're cream-filled, but I think I went overboard with them. So I wanted you to have the extras.”

She handed me, still sitting in my bed, the stack of boxes. I opened the top one – the doughnuts were glistening with sugared glaze – and tried one. It was orgasmic, I was moaning my appreciation. You could see the joy in Emma's face as I scarfed down one and then started on a second. I ended up emptying all three boxes while she and Aunt Rhonda stood by, watching.

“I'm glad you liked them,” she said, taking the now empty cases. “I've got some other recipes I want to try. Hopefully you'll like those as well.”

“Anytime you want to stop by,” Aunt Rhonda said. “Mel is the best taste-tester ever.”

The two walked out, leaving me to lick my fingers and doze back to sleep, excited with how well this was turning out.

When I came back home from a pizza binge that night I found Aunt Rhonda and Emma working in the kitchen.

“Hey, honey,” Aunt Rhonda said. “Em wanted to try a recipe for fried chicken. She swears by it.”

“It was the main attraction at my grandmother's restaurant,” her friend added. “It's made with real lard, but hopefully you're not worried about your figure.”

We spent all night with me eating and Aunt Rhonda and Emma cooking, the two ecstatic to see me wolfing down their offerings. Emma's grandmother sure knew her stuff; everything that came from her recipe books was to die for, and I almost wanted to order Emma to come back the next night to keep cooking for me.

Not that I needed to issue any demands. The next morning I was again awoken by Emma turning up with more treats for me, and that night not only Emma but Patsy came by to work the kitchen with Aunt Rhonda. Jana held out for a day longer, and when she came by she said it was to see her friends, but she was quickly at work peeling potatoes.

In just a couple days I had a personal staff of chefs, two of them as dedicated as you could want but the other two still coming by every evening and working to keep me stuffed. By the end of the week this was a normal routine for all of us, and on Saturday it was a day-long affair. I woke up and found a seat on the couch in the living room, and while I binge-watched Supernatural for the umpteenth time all four women were keeping the kitchen going, bringing me dish after bowl after dish of food.

This must be what it's like for Deena, I thought at one point. Not moving, no work, just sitting back and letting people bring you an endless stream of food.

The thought of the temple mother made me a little bit nervous. Aunt Rhonda had already invited her friends to tag along to McGreevy tomorrow, and I wondered how Deena would react to the news of me assembling a personal circle of feeders.

Not that it interrupted my feasting. I went to bed that night having eaten more in one day than I did in four before I came to South Carolina, and my hopes for the next day were to best even that.

When we got to McGreevy the next day (Aunt Rhonda driving me and the other three women piled into Emma's car) Rhonda led the others directly to the kitchen. But they had to go through the main hall to get there, and I know Deena saw them as they passed. Rather than try to hide or avoid confessing what was going on, I went over to Deena and laid the situation out completely.

143113231331112122223.content:
“I'm impressed you've managed to build a following like that in such a short time. It can often take years for a fatty to get a non-family member or friend to start waiting on them personally, and most never even accomplish that, but here you have three in just a couple months. Ceres is truly with you.”

“I was worried you would lecture me not to abuse my gift.” I relaxed. Deena seemed OK with this.

“Why would I do that?” She was genuinely surprised. “The worst thing you can do with any gift is not use it. If Ceres is giving you all this, you should seize it. How else can you show your devotion to her if you squander your abilities? I've never felt more sure of this, Melanie, that you have been chosen by our goddess for wonderful things. Don't throw that away. Eat, and enjoy the help of others around you. This can only be the start for you, I know it.”

Now emboldened by Deena's encouragement, I became even more demanding with Aunt Rhonda and her friends. I wasn't bossy or abusive in any way, but I threw away any reservations and fears about taxing their hospitality. When I wanted more food, I told them (politely) and they were quick to provide it. When I loved a particular recipe (and Emma brought so many great dishes to the table it was ridiculous) I said so, and they would always make more of it for me whenever I wanted. Every night the kitchen was packed with all four women working to feed one me, and every morning Emma came by with increasingly larger offerings of treats.

After a couple weeks of this I suggested (half-jokingly) that Emma should move in and work with Aunt Rhonda on her recipes all the time. And she actually did! Now I had her and Aunt Rhonda making me a giant breakfast every morning before they went to work. I was eating even more than ever now.

I had become the queen bee with Lily and the other congregants our age or younger, easily the fattest and most gluttonous, an inspiration to them. There weren't that many, only a handful, but plenty of the adults were also expressing admiration and amazement at how I was growing as a devotee of Ceres. I was still mostly focused on the immediate results of all this: giants feasts of food, and my body getting ever fatter and fatter. I was now the second-biggest person in the congregation, a distinction that was underscored more and more each time we got together. Rising steadily, my weight was coming to the half-ton mark and looking to leave it behind. What had once been something I could only dream about – being so fat I needed a fourth digit to express it – had almost become reality.

Whatever doubts I may have had about auras and Ceres' blessing was long gone. I was living the dream, and I knew where to give credit. For the first time ever I was starting to take religion seriously, but it still had trouble competing with my desire for instant gratification. Should I try to learn more about Ceres and Her wishes, I wondered, or should I keep on as I had been, and eat for my own pleasure?
143113231331112122223.title: She congratulates me for accomplishing this

My Mom—Time to convert the fat-shamer into a full-time blubber believer!
1431132313311121222232.content:
In the end, surprise surprise, pleasure won.

It wasn’t that I wasn’t starting to take this stuff seriously—I really was!—it was just that I couldn’t realistically see myself devoting any amount of time to serious study. Ceres was the goddess of the bounty, right? So what better way to get in touch with Ceres than by making sure I had an entourage of skinnies to coddle me? I knew that if I was ever going to get anywhere in my new life, I was going to need lots of help taking care of my fat ass.

We had just moved into the new apartment a little ways down the road. My bountiful body had officially outgrown the meager doorways provided in the old one, and with three occupants under one roof (not to mention to posse of skinnies it took to keep me satisfied) I had convinced my Aunt Rhonda that moving on up was the only solution. While everyone else around me struggled and heaved, my Aunt Rhonda and Emma toiling with the movers, I happily scarfed down treat after treat of sweet caloric goodness. Even as the time approached for the biggest move—being me—my appetite was not appeased. I was walked down the hallway, down the creaking elevator, and heaved into the car by three burly men from the moving company as my Aunt hand-fed me pastries and other sugary confections to keep me in good spirits.

It worked… mostly.

When we finally arrived I just collapsed into a pale heap of sweating mass right there on the new couch, sputtering and spewing stupidly as I struggled to catch my breath. As I neared ever closer to the coveted quadruple digit, what little exercise I got had plummeted even further. I was no longer capable of walking even to the other side of a room without becoming winded—all the more reason for me to have my Aunt at my beck and call. She was more than happy to help me, as were any of my other skinnies, but I really came to rely on her for a lot as I worked over-time in trying to reach the one-thousand pound mark.

“Oh Melanie… are you alright?” my aunt crooned as she wiped my head with a damp washcloth, dabbing away the sweat I’d accumulated from the top of my forehead, “Is there anything I can get you, sweetie?”

“Bear claw.” I gasped, barely lifting my arm in a weak plea for more, “Please.” I thickly added.

My aunt complied (of course she did!) and handed me one of the move-in boxes of donuts from this place called Apple Dumplin’s. She placed the box on the great shelf of my tits and left me to my own devices as I clumsily stuffed them into my mouth with my wide, obstructive arms.

The new place was specifically chosen with my size in mind. It was a bigger place in build, but also in design. The doorways—though not wide enough to allow me to enter hip-to-hip—were spacious enough for me to get through without too much hassle if I turned sideways. There were two double french doors serving as my main entrance and exit, and a considerable amount of time had been put into picking a place with a sizeable kitchen and living room area. It was perfect; just the kind of place a girl my size needed if she was going to be doted on all day.

I was mowing through my box of bear claws when Lily came into the living room, struggling with one of my bigger boxes of personal affections. Just a bunch of stuff from Buttercombe, and honestly probably not that heavy. But then Lily was lugging around her own bigness to boot, so her huffing and puffing wasn’t exactly uncalled for.

As I had grown, so had my little flock of fatties that followed me (although certainly to scale.) When I had met Lily, she had been a meager three hundred pounds squashed onto an already diminutive physique. As she and her family started taking me to the Temple and we started hanging out more and more, there had been a steady incline of intake and an increase of inches on her little big body. However once I started to fully accept my gifts, her own gain seemed to grow more pronounced.

“Fuckin’ fuck Mel!” she wheezed, dropping the box on the armrest and leaning over it with both hands, “What’s… what’s in this?”

“Stuff.” I said, my tone a little short as I begrudgingly divided my attention between Lily and food, “S’not that heavy, Lil.”

“What, compared to you?” Lily snorted, her laugh having become short and husky as her weight had climbed (I wondered idly if the same thing had happened to mine) “I’m happy to help you move and everything, but you never said it would be so much work—m’gonna take a break.”

My Aunt’s L-shaped couch—I was currently crushing the short end—was one of the few seating arrangements available if Lily and I wanted to sit together. My nearly half-tonnage was more than enough to swallow any loveseat that dared to oppose my massive ass, and even on most couches only women of my Aunt Rhonda’s size would have been able to sit comfortably next to me. Lily meanwhile had ballooned up so much that she was almost half my size; something that I would have considered impressive to have done in a little under a year if I weren’t, y’know, the size of a baby elephant.

Lily’s short stature made her look a lot fatter than she actually was, but that was no easy feat. She was getting pretty big under my tutelage. Her gut was this big, triply-tiered thing that sunk and sagged over her knees and held out almost as far as she could reach. Her tits were pretty huge too, something that I don’t say lightly. Mine were bigger because I was bigger, but if Lil ever got to my size, I doubt she’d be able to see anything in front of her. They were these big, milky white balloons that sagged to either side of her billowing belly as it sat up on the couch; flanked by two flabby arms and propped up on enough ass for four or five skinny Lilys.

Even with the company, I ate recklessly. The box of bear claws was demolished in a few minutes after Lily sat down, but my appetite had yet to be sated. Even after my breakfasts and brunches, plus all those snacks my Aunt had given me to coax me along while we moved, I had grown too greedy and my appetite too spoiled to do without.

“Lily.” I burped, “Mind getting me something else?”

“Uuuugh.” she mock moaned—though I could sense some genuine begrudging in her tone, “But I just sat down.”

“Lilyyyy…” I moaned for real, “I’m hungry!”

“Fine, fine.” Lily rolled her eyes and slowly rocked herself off of the couch, leaving her even more out of breath than she had been when she sat down, “We’ve really… really gotta… get you some… maids or somethin’.”

It was then that the idea had been formed, as she walked past and pat my belly approvingly. Lily meandered into the kitchen with my Aunt Rhonda and left me alone to my thoughts.

I had already used my aura to capture the hearts and minds of just about everyone in Aunt Rhonda’s office building. We had all these massive potluck dinners from everyone in her firm, and I had managed to get Emma to move in so she could help take care of me. I could pretty much go wherever I wanted and eat for free—who’s to say that I couldn’t convince a few more people into becoming full-time skinnies?

In fact, I had just the skinny in mind...

Okay, so I know what you’re probably thinking.

“But Mel, you moved to South Carolina because you hated living with your mom!”

Yeah, yeah, I know. But first, let me just clarify, I moved in with my Aunt because she kicked me out. Yeah my Mom was a pathological bitch, but I didn’t exactly mind living there for the two-point-five seconds that I stayed after getting out of Buttercombe. A lot of my old stuff was there, and so were what little friends I’d kept from Middle School—plus, now that I lived in SC, that meant I wouldn’t be able to see Alice on her holidays home from Buttercombe. Living with my mom entailed a lot more stuff than just her fat-shaming, force-dieting, aggressive-aggressive assholishness.

Second, that was kind’ve the whole point. My Mom had been trying to make me feel bad about my weight since I came home for Christmas freshman year fifty pounds heavier than when my skinny ass had left, and as I got bigger she became exponentially worse about it. Her shitty attitude and snide remarks were probably one of the biggest reasons that I started gaining intentionally, just to spite her, before I realized how much I enjoyed it. Getting her on my side—on the fat side!—would not only be an achievement for present-me, but it would be a delicious treat for past-Mel, and probably a treat for my sister if she was having as good a time at Buttercombe as I did.

I mean, trust me, I knew I was being a little manipulative. This whole aura business was still pretty new to me, even if I had abused it to all get-out as I got fatter and fatter, and I’ll admit that I wasn’t exactly using it responsibly here. But you’ve gotta understand; my Mom’s a bitch.

So I suggested to my aunt, ever so sweetly, that it was time we called Mommy Dearest and invite her out here for a little session of catch-up. My Aunt was probably about as wary as anyone who had spent an extended amount of time with my mother would have been, given that they were sisters and all, but she relented without too much of a fight. Not two hours after my conversation with Lily, my aunt was on the phone with my mother, telling her about her new place, new roommate, and how I had extended the invitation.

Believe it or not, my Mom agreed. Probably some snide remark about how she “knew it would just be a matter of time” before I came “crawling home.” Ugh. But still—it was more than likely she just didn’t have anyone else to bother. With the divorce, and Alice away at Buttercombe, I can imagine that she was probably lonely and bored.

I would be more than willing to give her something to fill her time with. And after a few weeks, Aunt Rhonda came back from the airport with my mother…

143113231331112122223222.content:
And after a few weeks of anticipation, my Aunt Rhonda came back from the airport one day—my mother in tow.

As much as I hated to admit it, I got most of my looks from her. She was shorter than my Aunt Rhonda, with blonde hair and a naturally round face. We both had the same green eyes and an equal propensity for a powerful resting bitch face. That was, fortunately, where the similarities stopped between us. And considering that I had finally managed to pass the half-ton mark, the differences between us were about a hundred and fifty pounds shy of being as vast as I was.

I had developed a nice little routine in my new place. I would wake up, gorge myself, and be waited on hand and foot by my aunt and her coworker Emma, who I had done well to convert to my cause. I slept in the living room, propped up on a mattress with pillows providing further support behind me. I was getting pretty fucking huge with Emma and my Aunt taking such good care of me! I hadn’t tried to move on my own since the big move, and honestly? I didn’t want to. The feeling of knowing that I was pinned down by my own immensity was this amazingly huge feat (and amazingly huge turn-on) I was just content to lay back and eat, eat, eat myself into further immobility.

Ever since I’d hatched my little plan (half-revenge, half pragmatic!) I’ll admit that I started working Emma and my aunt a little harder than normal. I was always insatiable but, for the past few weeks, I’d been insatiable. Maybe it was nerves, or maybe it was the knowledge that I’d finally gotten so fat that I needed another zero to accurately weigh it, but I’d been on eating overdrive. I needed a constant stream of calories to keep myself appeased, otherwise I got a little bitchy. Emma and my aunt were more than happy to oblige me (thanks to my handy-dandy blessing from Ceres. Thanks babe!) but even I was aware that I’d been a smidge more demanding than normal. Just a bit.

So when my mom came through the door, my aunt holding the door for her, you can probably imagine her surprise when she saw me.

I’d been eating when she walked in (because, in all honesty, when wasn’t I eating anymore?) so as much as I anticipated her arrival, it took me a minute to register that she was actually there. Emma stood at my bedside with a giant tray of her grandmother’s practically patented buttermilk griddlecakes, which I’d further improved upon by slathering them in butter and drowning them in syrup. I was only just barely decent, covered up just so by the bedsheet. It was so much easier to stay undressed when I didn’t have to go anywhere. My gut roamed the expanse of my mattress freely, pouring onto its expanse in a pale, jiggling avalanche of sweet delectable fat. Every so often, I would just cup one of my many rolls and or folds, and press it. Feel it yield to my touch before it started a soft wobbling that seemed to carry through my entire body. My chins bunched as I leaned forward, my arms pumping and wobbling as I fed myself like a hungry locomotive. My Mom had been standing in the doorway for about two minutes before I realized she was there.

When she kicked me out, I had only weighed four hundred pounds. My ass had gotten so fat that I crushed our old measly couch beneath me, and she had decided that she was through with me. Not only had I doubled my old weight, I’d doubled it half over! I had put on more than six hundred pounds since the last time my mother laid eyes on me; every one of those extra pounds had been bought through a life I could have never dreamed of having at home, or even at Buttercombe. I’d finally found my true calling in life—being a monumental fatass—and judging by the look on her face, my mother was none too pleased.

“M-Mel?” she just barely choked out my name, “I-Is that… you?”

“Hi Mom!” I snorted, not stopping my feasting even as I made my dramatic reveal, “Surprise!”

You know, I could actually see the gears turning in her head? Like, she was sputtering and smoking. Like she couldn’t comprehend how fucking immense I had become. Which was, you know, understandable given the fact that I weighed more than the rest of our family tree put together. I gave her my best smarmy, shit-eating grin as I let one hand fall from my feasting to jostle my oceanous belly. The look on her face was priceless. She was trying to hard to chew me out, to tell me off, to rip into me about how fucking enormous I’d gotten myself, but she couldn’t! I didn’t know if it was my Blessing or if she just honestly was at a loss for words. I didn’t know which one I would have liked better!

“While you’re having an aneurism, do you think you could get me the donuts?” I pointed with a sausagey finger, “Yeah, right there on the counter?”

“Huh?” my mom snapped out of her stupor, “Oh, um… sure…”

Much to my surprise (and unadulterated delight) my mom actually walked her skinny ass over and grabbed the box of donuts from the kitchen counter, and started walking them over to me. Mom probably hadn’t willingly touched donuts in years, and here she was bringing them to her whale of a daughter!

“Can I have a hug, at least?” I asked in my most pitiful voice as she set the donuts down, my arms spread out like jello-filled wings “I haven’t seen you in, like forever you know.”

“Of course you can, sweetie…” my Mom said softly as she wrapped her arms around me (well, as best she could manage) and wrapped me in the tightest hug she could, “Oh Mel you’re so… so…I’m…”

“Hey, no sweat.” I was pretty nonchalant about the whole thing now—it probably had something to do with the fact that I was a living acolyte for a goddess of bounty—and it was much easier to talk about my parental abandonment issues now than it had been, “Just… you know, happy to see you.”

I could almost see Ceres’ magic working its wonders on my mom. Where once she had been neglectful and shrewish, enough to chase away my Dad, she was suddenly overwhelmed with a rush of emotions. A need to care for me. Cook for me. Make sure I was comfortable. Did I need anything? I’d never seen anything like it.

“Well don’t worry Mel, I’m not going anywhere.” My Mom said, breaking the hug, my Blessing in full effect, “I… I shouldn’t have been so hard on you. And it’s clear that you need me. Now more than ever…”

She placed the donuts on my bed, and my greedy little hand just couldn’t help but dive right in.

“Well, you know, if you’re serious…” I looked longingly over to the fridge…

And without another word, my mom got right to work.

A few more weeks and a round-trip plane ticket later, my Mom was moved in, and I found myself one more helpful hand.

"Okay, seriously?" I sighed as I looked at my phone. It was Lily, but it had been a damn long time since I had heard from her, and I was half tempted to ignore the call. But, at the same time, I hadn't met anyone quite like Lily (well, let's be honest, I hadn't really met anyone since I got here besides her, I was too busy eating) so I finally answered my cell. "What's up?" I answered, a bit more curt than I had intended. I had texted her a few times since we ran into each other, but she had never responded, so I was a little pissy about it. But here she was, finally calling me.


"Hey, I'm sorry I've been kinda quite lately, I, uh-" I swear I heard a small belch, but I couldn't be sure. "I've been busy. But hey, we never hit up that buffet, did we? We should definitely go there today." By her tone, I could tell the apology was sincere enough.

"Yeah, that'd be good, when?" I asked before i took a bite out of my third bagel of the morning. I could tell my Aunt wouldn't be thrilled that I cleared out her cream cheese and half of her bagels, but whatever. It's not like she didn't make enough money.

"Uh, I was thinking, like, in a half hour?" She grunted, and this time I was positive I heard a burp afterwards. Was she seriously eating, before we even went to the buffet?

When we met up, I was positive she was eating while we were on the phone. Hell, I had to brush off a lot of crumbs before rolling up to the buffet, but Lily hadn't even tried to look like she hadn't been eating. She was wearing a nice blouse along with the same shorts she had been wearing the first time we met, but they looked a little tighter than I remembered, and the blouse was clinging to her sizable chest in a way that implied it wasn't quite so tight when she bought it. "Alright, well let's get going, I'm starving!" Lily said happily as we walked in.

"Well, sheesh, if you were hungry, you just had to say so, I'm pretty much always hungry!" I said jokingly, but Lily couldn't have heard me- she was already paid for and waddling towards the main line. And she wasn't kidding! I mean, I can eat, but this girl didn't just eat- she inhaled. Biscuits, potato, pasta, cookies, she practically drank a bowl of soft serve- this girl was a machine. When I was almost done eating my first platter (given a few small breaks to check on Lily's progress) she was already back with round two.

Before I got up to go again, I had to ask. "So Lily, you didn't quite eat like this before... What's up?" My stomach was grumbling, but curiosity was killing me.

"Well, I-" She started, before shoveling some french fries into her face. "I just... Look, this is embarrassing, but-"

1442.content:
Now, just to clear some things up, my 'Aunt' Rhonda was the youngest of my mum's siblings by quite a way. Y'know, surprise pregnancy type of thing after there wasn't meant to be any more kids blah blah blah. Anyway, so Rhonda is only like in her mid 30's so we always got on well because she was the cool young aunt who totally got my young free spirit. Secondly, she did...god only knows what for a living but she worked from home, did very little actual work and earned a crap load of money doing it, so basically my dream career. And thirdly, last time I saw her she was with some dude called Mark or Mike or something else beginning with 'M'. He seemed like a nice guy, we never really met properly but he seemed cool and Rhonda seemed happy with him.
Anyway, after hours of been stuck in this damn car I roll up in the drive of my aunts house, switch the ignition off and close my eyes for a breather. It's hard work driving when you're this fat y'know? Whilst my eyes are closed I'm oblivious to the world and nearly jump out of my skin when I feel two arms around my neck.
"Oh my god babe, sorry I made you jump!"
The familiar sounds of my aunts voice calm me slightly as her arms retract out of the open window.
"Don't worry about it, I was way out of it then. Been driving for hours" I respond, taking my first look at the woman who I hadn't seen in about 18months. She looked as beautiful as ever, because yes, she was beautiful, there's no shame in finding a female relative attractive ok? Like all the Carlisle women she was blonde, and if I recall rightly of moderate height at about 5'5 but, unlike last time I saw her, her face looked a little...chubby?
"Well come on then sweets, let's get you inside!" Rhonda chirped, opening my door and making it clear that it was just her face that was looking more weighty.
Peeking not so subtly out of her white t shirt was some serious pudge, we're talking curving over waistbands, belly button indenting so hard its visible through said t shirt, muffin topping your hips to some serious thickness pudge. Unaware of my staring, Rhonda turned to walk back up her drive, giving me front row seats to her frankly huge ass. Each step caused ripples to move through each fattened cheek as her yoga pants cladded rear sashayed back to the house. Fuck me, Rhonda had gotten thick!
Is I followed her into the house I estimated she must have blown up nearly 100lbs since I'd last seen her which was mind boggling considering how thin she used to be.
"You're looking good Aunt" I said, testing the ground desperate to find out more about this sudden and impressive (for a thin girl) gain.
"Aww thanks sweetie! You're looking rather good yourself" she said with a smile "but please don't call me aunt, it makes me feel like a million years old"
She laughed then proceeded to give me a tour of the house which proved tiresome, I'd been in the car for hours remember, but finally we settled back in the living room.
"You must be hungry Mel after all this time, want me to order some food in?"
Before I could even open my mouth my stomach did the talking, rumbling like a disgruntled beast under my shirt.
My aunt laughed again, grabbed the phone and plopped heavily down in a seat causing her belly to slap onto her thighs. She dialled a number, waited a moment and then started to order.
"Hey Gino, how you doing? I know, it's been a couple of days, I'm practically wasting away here!" I noticed her absently rubbing her belly as she said this. Well she's not in denial at least. My trance was broken by my aunts voice reeling off food options which was making me hungrier.
"Anyway sweets, I'll take an extra large pepperoni, a bucket of fries, four cheese burgers and your special ultimate cheesy garlic bread. Yes that'll be...no wait! My niece is here, silly me, erm..." she tilts the phone down from her mouth to talk to me, "what do you want Mel?"
I look in slight awe as it dawns on me that was for her, getting a little closer to explaining her waistline now.
"Erm..." I flounder unsure whether to really poke the bear and go full hog myself, but before I get chance to answer
"Yeah, she'll have the same and throw in an extra bucket of fries as well. Yeah that'll be all, just stick it on my tab"
She has a tab at a takeaway?! Ok, Rhonda is now my hero.
Rhonda hangs up the phone, "food will be here in about half an hour"
"Cool" I reply, curiosity getting the better of me now.
"Rhonda?"
"Yeah?" She doesn't look up from her phone, scrolling Facebook or something.
"Look, there's no easy way to ask this but I'm absolutely desperate to know...", like seriously, I'm not sure if I'm more hungry or curious at this point which is new for me.
Rhonda looks up with a small smile on her lips, "you want to know where this came from?" She asks whilst pinching a handful of her ample muffin top.
Caught off guard by her bluntness I dither before nodding.
She chuckles softly, "well babe..."

"...I just love to eat."
I look slightly dumbfounded at the glaring obviousness of the statement, being quite the foodie myself.
Sensing my confusion Rhonda continues
"Well I just assumed that, being as you are Melly, you knew how a girl gets fat", she throws me a wink and slides off her chair and pads heavily into the kitchen, returning with three sharing bags of crisps and a litre of thick chocolate shake which was already passing her lips as she sat back down.
Compared to mother dearest this open fat talk and acceptance was very foreign...and very enjoyable too
"Ok, so long story short sweets I met this guy who was something of a spoiler, particularly in the food department, and it unlocked one hell of a crazy appetite that has spent 18 months building until..." all this was said between mouthfuls of crisps and with a playful rub of that well filled out tummy, why couldn't everybody in my family be this awesome?! Rhonda's voice broke me out of my temporary trance.
"Well until I got where I am today, a 240lb ass that just keeps growing and I love it."
Rhonda smiled gleefully at this announcement and hunkered down in her chair slightly more, causing the overtaxed white tshirt to slide up her front that bit more.
I nod, mostly to myself, as I mull over what I've just been told. Could this really be happening? A member of my family that totally digs the fat life?
"So is there still a guy?" I ask
With a slight snort mid sip, Rhonda shakes her head "nah, been a couple since the first but the last was about 3 months ago, had to climb over 200 on my lonesome." The words sounded sad, but the smile told me they weren't. Living here had a lot of potential.
"What about you Mel? Any significant others?"
"Nope, I'm a lone wolf at this point" I pat my, admittedly, more sizeable belly with a matching smile to my aunt's
"Nice going girl!" The doorbell rings "I think you and me are going to have some fun Mel."
She throws a wide grin my way over her shoulder as she goes to the door. Weirdly now knowing Rhonda's actual weight made her look bigger; there was a good plump belly and hips to go with that behind and she looked good for it.
As I waited for food to come I was left with my mind and, with the words of my mum ringing in my ears still, my stomach rumbled.
Jiggling back, Rhonda placed the pile of boxes on the table with a slight skip (for a woman of her size) in her step, "we got cakes too Mel! Argh, I love these guys!"
I laugh, seeing someone this excited about food was refreshing and a little bit arousing to be honest.
"Here, start eating or I'm having it all!" Rhonda pushed my share into my ribs to get my attention.
And so we ate.
Time passed by, we talked, we laughed, we watched films and the copious amounts of food started to dwindle. The evening continued and we lost track of time until all had been eaten, well, mostly.
I'd not binged that hard in a while so was breathing hard whilst leant back into my seat, belly rounded and exposed the elements as i lazily stroked my ballooned sides. I was impressed with myself, mentally marking it as an impressive feast, but the title of the evening was definitely taken by my aunt.
Having eaten the lions share she was currently handballing dense chocolate cake into her mouth, her face smeared in chocolate like a true glutton. Eating on autopilot she seemed blissfully unaware of the fact her tshirt, now stained brown in places, resembled more of a bra as her spherical belly rose with each gentle breath pushing the stretched fabric over her girth.
Eating always had a drowsy effect on me and I was unable to fight the heaviness of my eyelids as they closed, leaving me with the last image of my gluttonous aunt chowing down. As sleepy brain took over it dawned on me that my aunt may have been sat opposite me but I had a feeling that I was actually sat across from a true binge sister.
This was going to be fun indeed.

Mostly because I spent ages fourteen to eighteen in a ritzy isolated preparatory school in the mountains, but also because my Mom never really made it possible for my Aunt to visit us, or vice versa. I never really thought much about it, being a kid and all, but as I got older and I started to awaken to my own peculiar desires, I began to notice some striking similarities between my Mom's relationship with her sister and my Mom's relationship with me.

Whenever Aunt Rhonda came over, my Mom would make me and my sister (and my Dad too, now that I mention it) watch our portion sizes. She always got super crazy about how much we ate whenever Aunt Rhonda came around, and at the time (in my younger, more naive days) I thought that it was because she wanted to make sure that her sister got enough to eat. Forgive me, I was like five. But what was actually happening was a lot more indicative of how she'd treat me every year I came back heavier for Christmas. My Mom wasn't making sure that Aunt Rhonda had enough to eat, she was trying to curb our appetites so that we didn't end up like Aunt Rhonda.

Ever since I was a little girl, my Aunt had been a big woman. Like, a big woman. Compared to my cutting-board Mom and my then not-Dad-bodded father, my Aunt had to have been the biggest person in history to itty bitty me. Which was only fair considering I got little to no maternal interest or guidance at home before I moved out. It was only fitting that I got love from someone, right?

I mean, it wasn't like we didn't have anything in common. As I got older, I found that I was very much cut from the same cloth as my aunt. 145311.content:
So to recap, after I was kicked out by my Mother because of my fat-ass and desire to become even fatter, I go to move in with my fat Aunt in South Carolina and discover that she’s blimped to 600 pounds and has become rich and retired and want’s to get even bigger.

Am I in a Twilight Zone episode or what?

Aunt Rhonda’s size was always a sticking point back when she was half of her current weight. While she had always possessed a large appetite on the rare occasion my Mom would let her come round to see us, but I never would of thought that she would actively try to put on weight, On purpose, out of boredom!

I can’t complain though, just getting away from my controlling Mother was thrilling enough, but the fact I would be moving from a home which limited and shamed my gluttony and decadence to a home that encouraged it. Talk about full circle. Besides, I’m always eager to help my favourite Aunt!

So once I got settled after a couple days in my new digs, the first thing my Aunt decided to introduce to me was the local South Carolina cuisine.

That is to say every take-out, diner, fast-food joint and other incredibly fattening business there is in the area.

So, two already obese Aunt and Niece combined with plenty of cash and even more greed and extreme hunger will lead to some major gains. If my soaring weight gain at Buttercombe was plentiful, this’ll be crazy!

*

About three weeks after I moved in with my Aunt, I could confidently say with one-hundred percent certainty. I was getting pretty fat. Like really fat.

Making my way downstairs on this balmy Tuesday Morning, I sleepily trundled down each step. My whole body breaking out into jiggles underneath my ill-fitting red tee. My stomach had begun to stick out more in front, being more obvious as it crept downward over my waist. My breasts were heavier, really pushing the bras I crammed them in to their limits and my ass was jigglier than ever, with more flab meaning all of the pants I wore were at risk of getting ripped.

I hadn’t weighed myself since moving. With Rhonda’s heavy duty scale that had a weight capacity of 1000 pounds, I decided to wait awhile to see what results South Carolina had on Ol’ Melly’s growth.

Making my way to the living room, I saw an all too familiar sight.

It was of Aunt Rhonda, waddling her way between the Kitchen and the living room, platters full of food in tow, huffing with every heavy foot-fall. During our ‘Catching Up’ (Which was us pigging out with the occasional dialogue.) She was absolutely fatter, just not as noticeable as mine. But at 600+ pounds, what more could change?

There was changes, no doubt! All that was left of her stretchy sweatpants were destroyed by her legendary tank ass, her triple-tiered belly was only a few scant lines from touching the floor and her blobby face seemed to have a fourth chin in the works.

"Mornin’ sleepyhead!" My Aunt greeted me with a smile while she parked herself on the L-shaped couch, it releasing a cry of agony when she made contact with it. "Morning..." I replied, yawing and giving my plentiful gut a scratch. "You haven’t started breakfast... without me, yeah?" I asked with a bit of concern in my voice. More than once, Rhonda had gorged herself stupid while I slept in, leaving me to munch on scraps! It’s probably my fault for sleeping in, but, then again, asking a ravenous blob of a woman to hold back was like asking a fish to hop on dry land and breath air.

My Aunt burst out laughing, her acres of stomach flab bouncing with each chortle. "I didn’t, I held back. But it’s rude to keep yer Aunt waiting like that! Not my problem you sleep so late I can’t help myself!" My Aunt jeered, Waving a pudgy finger at me. "You’re sounding a lot like Mom right now." I snorted, making my way to the pink loveseat that sat opposite the couch. There was no chance in hell we were both gonna fit on the couch without it exploding into dust, so I was delegated to the other seats in the room.

With the food served we both go into a frenzy, eating as fast as possible. Neither has eaten in 8 hours(unless you count our midnight snacks) so you'd understand our predicament. For the first ten minutes I keep up the pace with my aunt, I've been getting better at it but I still cannot fully compete with her monster of a belly.

Finally the food runs out and I don't even feel the need to rub my belly. Don't get me wrong, we had just eaten enough to feed 8 people easily, but we usually go for seconds and sometimes thirds. I stare at my Aunt and she's just relaxing there.

"Is there more?" I say


She giggles "Was beginning to think you'd never ask. Don't you worry." she smiles and closes her eyes again.

"Well I hope whatever you have planned is big. I mean I love my new size but my belly isn't quite covering my lap just yet and by next week I want that but on an empty stomach."

She says "Maybe you'd get there faster if you woke up sooner. More time for eating." Now I'm starting to believe she and my mom actually have a few more things in common than I thought.

I roll my eyes and right about then we hear the doorbell. My aunt says "Do you mind getting that sweety?, I'm not exactly presentable at the moment" she slaps the side of her gigantic belly.

"Fine" I say while rocking my obese body. I waddle to the front door and take a short breather before opening.

I'm met with a small stack of boxes hovering in front of my face. I look down and I see small hands holding them up. "Hi, Rhonda! pleasantries aside, could you help a girl out please?"

"Oh, um sure." I take all but the bottom box which reveals a slim brunette woman. "Nice to meet you?"

The woman smiles "Oh that explains why the door opened so quickly. I'm Laura, nice to meet you and you're..."

"I'm Mel. I'm guessing this is more food, it smells great by the way. Let's put these inside." my arms are beginning to hurt. We put the boxes beside the door and I stare down at them. "Oh, I'm going to regret putting them there."

Laura laughs and suddenly my aunt yells from the living room. "Sorry I can't meet you in person right now Laura, I couldn't find anything that'd fit me this morning. Glad that you finally met my favorite niece!"

I look back up and for a moment I see Laura biting her lip before saying "I didn't know you had niece! oh, I see the resemblance. You take after your aunt so much. I'm so happy" she steps forward and gives me her best attempt at a hug and I swear she squeezed a bit of fat for a moment.

"The bill is in one of the boxes and I wish you both a nice meal!" and just like that she left. "Um, thanks."

I groan before bending down. With the stacked boxes safely locked between my hands and belly fat, I waddle back to my Aunt. She says "Finally, I was beginning to feel absolutely ravenous again."

Still a little confused I say "She is nice, very" my aunt continues "Clingy?" I giggle while opening the box "I was going to say friendly, but yea, clingy." Especially after she saw me from head to toes I think.

"She's harmless, don't worry. Now, let's dig in!"


We eat and we eat, this food is delicious. After an hour and we still are only a third of the way done. My stomach is already beginning to really stretch, completely covering my lap and still I'm eating like mad. Though I was ecstatic I had kept up with my behemoth of an aunt for so long it was time for me to call it quits right before Rhonda was finishing the second to last box.

I fall asleep in a food coma. I have crazy dreams about food and about growing. Then my dreams cycle back to home and my family but I was to deep to feel anything. A cracking noice starts to pull me away from my dream when suddenly.

Crash!

I wake up immediately to my huge favorite aunt laying down between couch debris in all her obese glory.

Thighs so thick that even chubby people's waists are thinner than each of them. Love handles so filled with love that my arms are permanently resting at an increasingly odd angle.

145311221.content:
My alarm rings earning a rough groan from a very sleepy me. I check the clock and it's freaking 5 in the morning. You may be thinking, Mel, an early bird? impossible. I have a well-thought-out plan you know. My generously sized aunt had managed to grow a whopping 300 pounds in over a year, something which took me around 4 years to do, I was clearly doing something wrong. I know the gap between me and Rhonda had gotten bigger, not smaller in these past 3 weeks.

I did some research yesterday and this is step 1. Step 1 is waking up at this insufferable early hour in the morning.

"Ugh... f**k yesterday me, seriously." I say while sitting up on my bed. "Sun's not even up yet, goddamnit." I know I'm not known for my vulgar vocabulary, but I'm used to sleeping 'til 10 or later, I cut 5 precious hours of beauty sleep. Could you really blame me for being particularly grumpy?

Something I'm not really used to though is that I wake up not feeling particularly hungry at all, that's a first in a very long time. I grab my phone and I start browsing social media to pass the time until my aunt woke up to cook us breakfast (step 4).

Apparently Hillary Heart was doing a concert this week back home. Maybe you don't this, but I used to be the absolute biggest fan. Back in Buttercomb I even had this bright pink poster of her in a very sensual pose, I'm not really sure how I got dad to buy it for 14 year old me.

All the nostalgia this brings me, for a moment I'm just dying to go back home, but that's beside the point. I wonder what my childhood idol has been up to for half a decade so my stalking begins. On her own page, I do not find any current photos of her, only fresh pictures oh her "H in a heart" logo and a few different variants of the thing. It's not a dead-end though, because it leads me to an acceptance movement. A HUGE size acceptance movement with her as the face of it all.

You could probably guess why, as of 6 months ago she had gotten huge apparently. Near my size but still noticeably smaller than me. Who knew she'd Be All I Could Be, I'd show myself out but that would be too much effort.


I check the clock again; it's only 6:30 and I'm starting to get painfully hungry. My poor stomach cries and howls like a wounded animal and I try my best to soothe it. "Shut up, you'll wake her up!" I whisper at my own belly. This is step 2, skipping a meal. Who knew that a common practice in people's diets could be such a huge mistake. Considering how much I eat and how quickly I get hungry again waiting for my aunt is going to feel like skipping 2 instead.

Not going to lie, trying my hardest to keep my crybaby of a stomach from waking my favorite aunt up has been really stressful, why do I do this to myself I wonder.

"To become the biggest bitch in the world, that's why." I remind myself out loud, maybe to better convince myself. Regardless, this sucks. I wonder if Alice will go to the concert, wish I go with her.


At last, I hear my aunt's bed creaking as she surely wakes up and wiggles her colossal body out of bed. "Oh thank God!" I swear I haven't gotten out of bed so fast in a year.

I manage to get out of my bed, waddle to the bathroom and splashing my face real quick before Rhonda sidesteps out of her room. I peek into the hallway to say "Mornin’ sleepyhead!" oh the satisfaction.

She slightly recoils in place, pressing on the wall the part of her ass that was still in her bedroom. "Mornin’ Mel, um, how good to see you awake right now!"

"Hey, could we maybe get a bigger spread for breakfast? I'm absolutely famished right now." Step 4, stupidly large portions.

The rest of the day goes more or less like usual, us binging on food until inducing a food coma. This time though I try my hardest to reduce my downtime and I even had drink some coffee to stay awake until my usual bedtime. This masterplan should slow my metabolism to a halt practically.

I'm planning on struggling like this for

" she leans back and says "I'll bring some goodies for you, I bet you two are not even close to full! Can't have my lovely clients starving."

Suddenly Laura appears serving trays on our table. Mine was packed with everything I could drool over if I wasn't so stuffed. There's even an entire rack of ribs on top of it all.

We take our time to give our bellies a fighting chance and we chat between bites. She asks me a lot about Buttercombe. I had already told her roughly about my weight gain journey but we hadn't really talked about my fat girl adventures.

I had to lose weight back then because we had acquired a relatively big online media company and I oversaw the transition between administrations. I had was required to fire many workers including some of their veteran editors and they didn't take it nicely. Really tense atmosphere back there, people did not make my job any easier so I had to run around all the time. Winning the lottery was such a huge godsend. I rushed to finish my duties and a couple weeks later I handed in my resignation letter and moved south to here."

I skipped meals, I simply didn't have the time some days and I've always been a big eater, even back then, it was so stressful. A couple of weeks before, I got a Facebook message from one of my old roommates. She were going to be in town for a while, something about her father, and thought it would be really nice if we met up again. I told her that sounded great, and we should do lunch.

So I got lunch. The Saturday that she was supposed to arrive, I parked myself in a McDonalds and ordered myself a dozen McDoubles and started grazing.

Yeah, I know, McDonalds. Cliche. But hey, we Buttercombe Girls have a reputation of having really big appetites. The only problem being that, unlike my visiting friend, my Daddy didn't sneeze out hundreds whenever I wanted him to. So I knew if we were going to go out on the town, I had to eat cheap. Thus, McDonalds.

I'd dressed nice enough. It was Autumn, and I'd put on maybe another thirty pounds since I'd last seen her. But it was starting to cool off, so I wore my once-roomy Buttercombe Academy hoodie. It was pretty snug now, wrapping all the way around me (just barely) and managing to keep me mostly decent. My yoga pants were paper-thin though, stretched across my massive ass so far you could count the dimples. I attracted some stares, yeah, but I really couldn't blame them. If I remembered our message right, my guest should be dressed similarly.

Not that I needed clothes to pick out my old roomie...
153.title: Private Reunion
